book of wind.name: Gale Force Dash
book of wind.hit: Move up to 5 times your speed.
book of wind.description: The user flashes out of view, before reappearing somewhere else. The only sign of their movement is the sonic boom left in their wake.

book of wind.name: Gliding Leap
book of wind.hit: Your character flies up to 2 times their speed. Must end movement on the ground.
book of wind.description: The caster leaps into the air with a gust of wind, and soars, before landing with grace.

book of wind.name: Hurricane Gale
book of wind.description: The caster creates a powerful wind tunnel. The surging gale is strong enough to break bones, and sends foes tumbling back.

book of wind.name: Sonic Wave
book of wind.description: The caster unleashes a cresent blast of wind, effectively dealing with multiple foes.

book of wind.name: Updraft
book of wind.hit: Create an elevator of air that can carry the caster or their allies up to 50ft in vertical height or safely lower them. Lasts 1 turn.
book of wind.description: The caster creates a vertical shaft of air currents that can be used to navigate vertical surfaces, or to scout an area.

book of wind.name: Tornado
book of wind.hit: Create a tornado. Any character (friend or foe) that enters the effect spaces is shifted 5 spaces away. Enemies launched by the tornado also take your spell damage.
book of wind.description: The caster creates a violent cyclone, and uses it's currents to sling friend or foe across the battlefield.

polearm mastery.name: Cross Check
polearm mastery.description: Make a quick reactive shove against nearby foes

polearm mastery.name: Ensnare
polearm mastery.description: Using the length of your weapon, corner an enemies movement

polearm mastery.name: Heavy Javelin
polearm mastery.effect: After the Attack, your weapon lands in the same space as the target. You can retreive your weapon as a Free Action when standing on or adjacent to the weapon.
polearm mastery.description: Hurl your weapon with massive force, launching it across the battlefield.

polearm mastery.name: Impaling Lance
polearm mastery.description: Skewer your foes with a long stab

polearm mastery.name: Keeping Distance
polearm mastery.trigger: When an enemy moves adjacent to you, use your reaction to make this attack
polearm mastery.hit: Weapon + Attribute Damage, and the user shifts 1 space
polearm mastery.description: Carefully step around enemies, using the range of your weapon to your advantage

polearm mastery.name: Pike Brace
polearm mastery.effect: The moment an enemy moves into or within your melee range, use your Reaction to make the following attack.
polearm mastery.description: You brace your polearm against the ground and hold your position against incoming enemies.

polearm mastery.name: Polearm Leg Sweep
polearm mastery.description: Sweep your weapon along the ground, tripping up your foes.

book of lightning.name: Chain Lightning
book of lightning.hit: Spell Damage. An enemy within 3 spaces of the target also takes your casting attribute in damage.
book of lightning.description: The caster launches a blast of lightning that leaps between foes.

book of lightning.name: Complete Circuit
book of lightning.effect: Draw a line between as many targets on the field as you can, with no more than three spaces between each target. The line must start with you. Roll once for all targets.
book of lightning.description: Electricity is always trying to find a path, and you are the hand that guides it.

book of lightning.name: Lightning Rods
book of lightning.hit: Pick 3 Spaces in range 10. Draw a line connecting each of them. Any enemies caught on this line take Spell damage + Attribute.
book of lightning.description: Create a glyph on the floor of the battlefield, and connect them to create a devestating magic blast.

book of lightning.name: Lightning Strike
book of lightning.hit: Spell Damage + Attribute. All adjacent enemies also take half damage and are knocked away 1 space.
book of lightning.description: From the sky comes a thunderous bolt, striking a wide area.

book of lightning.name: Storm Cloud
book of lightning.effect: Create a storm cloud. It moves one space in any direction at the start of your turn. All targets underneath the storm cloud are attacked by it. Lasts 3 turns.
book of lightning.description: A cloud drifts atop the battlefield, tossing bolts of lightning down at those who dare tread beneath it.

book of lightning.name: Thundering Strike
book of lightning.hit: Spell Damage and Deafened (1). All adjacent enemies are also Deafened (1).
book of lightning.description: Which is worse, the scorching bolt of lightning or the ear shatter bang of thunder?

book of lightning.name: Zeus' Javelin
book of lightning.description: The caster tosses a bolt of lightning from their hands, it shakes with energy. Upon impact, the blast is a mesmerizing sight to behold.

medic.name: First Aid
medic.description: You quickly tend to an allies wounds, to varying degrees of success.

medic.name: Health Concoction
medic.hit: The target heals equal to their battered threshold
medic.description: A potent medicinal concoction that takes days to ferment, best not to waste it.

medic.name: Man Down!
medic.effect: Target must be prone or bleeding out
medic.hit: Move up to your speed while shifting the ally up to your speed. The ally must be adjacent to you at the end of this movement. This movement triggers opportunity attacks for you, but not your ally.
medic.description: You frantically drag an ally across the battlefield, bringing them to safer position where you can tend to their wounds.

medic.name: Stabilize
medic.description: You use all you know about medicine and tending wounds to quickly assist a downed ally.

medic.name: Adrenaline Jolt
medic.description: You use a special concoction to push your body to it's limits.

medic.name: Field Splint
medic.description: Using the right procedure, you can splint more serious wounds.

medic.name: Painkillers
medic.description: You analyze the inflicted and cure them of an ailment on their senses.

medic.name: Self Care
medic.description: You quickly patch yourself up, using whatever bandages you have on you.

medic.name: Close Lethal Wounds
medic.effect: The target is healed up to half of their health rounding down and one Death Mark is removed
medic.description: Taking dire measures, you perform a frantic operation on the battlefield, recovering an ally from near death.

medic.name: Intensive Care
medic.effect: Healing occurs at the start of your next turn, if you or the ally are moved or take damage before that time, the spell fails and cannot be used for the rest of the chapter.
medic.description: A powerful single target healing spell, but it takes a bit to cast. The process is delicate, and can be disrupted.

medic.name: Last Man Standing
medic.effect: If 2 or more allies are bleeding out, gain Inspired (3)
medic.description: True heroes rise above when all else has fallen around them.

medic.name: Medic!
medic.effect: When any ally is bleeding out, increase your speed by an amount equal to your speed.
medic.description: When an ally is in need, you sprint to the scene! You push yourself past your limits until they are safe.

mage.name: Exploding Orb
mage.description: The caster uses their spell style to blast an orb at their target, detonating it for an explosive result.

mage.name: Hunter Ray
mage.effect: This Attack ignores damage reduction of any kind.
mage.description: The caster uses their spell style to fire a persistent tracking beam, that will hunt its prey to no end.

mage.name: Twin Blast
mage.description: The caster uses their spell style to unleash two magic missles.

mage.name: Unstable Blast
mage.description: Using their spell style, the caster uses an unstable array of magic to increase the power of their attack.

mage.name: Glyph Trap
mage.effect: Spaces become marked after casting. The attack does not trigger until the start of your next turn. This attack automatically hits.
mage.description: The caster uses their spell style to create a series of glyphs on the floor. After a few seconds, they erupt with explosive force.

mage.name: Magic Barrage
mage.effect: You may target the same character multiple times.
mage.description: The caster fires a barrage of magic bolts in their spell style.

mage.name: Point Blank Annihilation
mage.description: Using their spell style, the caster sets off a powerful and precise explosion at an undeserving target in close range.

mage.name: Volatile Spell Strike
mage.effect: If an ally is within 2 spaces of the target, you cannot cast this spell
mage.description: Using their Spell Style, the caster lets loose a wild and uncontrollable blast of magic.

mage.name: Arcane Nova
mage.hit: Create a swirling orb of energy. The target in the middle of the blast cannot avoid the attack by any means. All targets around the rim must rely on their reflex. All caught take 2 x Spell Damage.
mage.description: You make a dense blast of magic in your spell style out of thin air, surprising an unlucky group of foes.

mage.name: Charge Beam
mage.effect: When you use this action, you are rooted (1). The attack does not trigger until the start of your next turn. This attack automatically hits.
mage.description: The caster amasses energy with their spell style, and then unleashes it in a powerful beam.

mage.name: Homing Ray
mage.effect: The target needs to be visible to the caster. Spell + Force damage.
mage.description: Using their Spell style, the caster fires a ray of power that only the most nimble foes could outmanuever.

mage.name: Magic Overload
mage.miss: Deal damage to self. Targets take 2 Spell + Force Damage
mage.description: Using their Spell Style, the caster gathers a dangerous amount of power, and unloads it in a volatile explosion.

mage.name: Stormwrath
mage.description: The caster creates dark clouds above a zone, and then rains chaos onto those below.

conjurer.name: Additional Conjuration
conjurer.effect: If you have Summon Guardian, Summon Familiar, or Summon Totem, and have expended it's use, you can use one of those abilities again, even if the last summon is still alive.
conjurer.description: You have found a way to support two identical stable summons at the same time, a miracle of magic!

conjurer.name: Summon Familiar
conjurer.effect: Summons a Familiar. Attack and Hit describes it's basic attack. The Guardian has 15 in all Defensive Stats. The Familiar's range is 10. It's speed is 3, and it has 1 Health. The Familiar always takes it's turn after caster's turn. It's damage is considered nonmagical
conjurer.description: You conjure a Familar. A magical creation in the style of your Spell Style that will harrass the enemy with ranged magic.

conjurer.name: Summon Guardian
conjurer.effect: Summons a Guardian. Attack and Hit describes it's basic attack. The Guardian has 15 in all Defensive Stats. The Guardian's range is adjacent. It's speed is 4, and it has 1 Health. The Guardian always takes it's turn after caster's turn. The Guardian can perform opportunity attacks. It's damage is considered nonmagical
conjurer.description: You conjure a Guardian. A magical creation in the style of your Spell Style that will defend you with melee attacks.

conjurer.name: Summon Totem
conjurer.effect: Summons a Totem. Attack and Hit describes it's basic attack. The Guardian has 15 Defence, 15 Grit, 10 Reflex. The Totem's range is 10. It cannot move, and it has 1 Health. The Totem always takes it's turn after caster's turn. It's damage is considered nonmagical
conjurer.description: You conjure a Totem. A magical creation in the style of your Spell Style that launches powerful artillery magic at the enemy.

conjurer.name: Detonate Summon
conjurer.effect: Your Summon is destroyed. All characters adjacent to your summon is targetted.
conjurer.description: Overcharging with magic, your summon explodes in a violent blast.

conjurer.name: Shield Projection
conjurer.description: You project a shield around your summons, allowing them to withstand smaller attacks.

conjurer.name: Summoner's Bridge
conjurer.effect: Any ability you have equipped can be cast through your summon as if you were standing in their place
conjurer.description: Your summons are an extension of your magic, and from their branches you will loose your power!

conjurer.name: Swap Summon
conjurer.effect: You and one of your summons, or two of your summons swap spaces through simultaneous teleportation. Includes Tinkerer and Necromancer summons.
conjurer.description: You and your summons opperate on a different plane of movement than other subpar adventurers.

conjurer.name: Guardian Angel
conjurer.trigger: An ally within range 5 of one of your summons takes damage that would reduce their health to 0
conjurer.effect: Your summon may instead take the attack, being destroyed in the process.
conjurer.description: Your summons are temprorary, allies are forever

conjurer.name: Link Bolt
conjurer.effect: Draw a line of spaces as straight and short as possible between two summons. If the straight line could be drawn in multiple ways, then the player chooses which spaces will be considered part of the straight line. All characters on this line are targetted. The summons cannot be further than 11 spaces apart.
conjurer.description: You use the dense magic air between your summons to create an arcane bolt of power!

conjurer.name: Lock On
conjurer.effect: Pick a target. All of your Summons have advantage on Attacks made against that target. Lasts until the start of your next turn.
conjurer.description: Your summons focus down an enemy with lethal force.

conjurer.name: Summon Surge
conjurer.effect: All of your active Summons get an extra attack the turn this is used.
conjurer.description: Your summons go overboard with power, moving faster than their physical bodies should allow.

wizard.name: Eye of Newt
wizard.effect: Can only be used on an enemy once per encounter.
wizard.hit: Add (1) to an Affliction already on the target enemy.
wizard.description: Cause your foe to wallow and sulk in their own suffering, intensifying their afflictions.

wizard.name: Halting Pulse
wizard.description: The caster uses their spell style to blast nearby threats away.

wizard.name: Hex
wizard.description: Weaken your enemies with a deadly glyph that sucks the strength out of those that are caught

wizard.name: Vertigo
wizard.description: A pulse of gravitational magic that throws off the balance of your foes.

wizard.name: Detonation Curse
wizard.hit: At the end of their next turn, the target and all other characters in range 2 take 4 Intellect damage.
wizard.description: This curse manifests into a swirling orb and launches at your target. The orb then coats the target in a glowing sheen that grows stronger to the point of boiling over in an eldritch explosion.

wizard.name: Entrancing Lights
wizard.hit: The Target is stunned and immobilised. They remain this way until the effect ends, and are not tracked like normal afflictions. This effect ends if the target takes damage or if an adjacent character uses a Free Action to snap them out of it.
wizard.description: Your targets stare in bewilderments at the flickering lights. Oh, how they dance and flicker...

wizard.name: Reconstruction
wizard.hit: You may transfer all afflictions between these enemies in any way you would like. You could give them all to one, or spread them out in any order.
wizard.description: You are a master of mind, body, and soul. They are constructs, and you are the constructer.

wizard.name: Two Way Fog
wizard.effect: Lasts until the end of combat
wizard.hit: Create a shroud of fog. As long as a character remains inside the fog, they are permanently blinded.
wizard.description: The caster calls upon a thick cloud, and it obscures the view of all inside, without hiding them from your ranged attacks.

wizard.name: Decomposing Curse
wizard.description: Rot away at the bodies of weakened foes around you.

wizard.name: Dissapearing Puddle
wizard.effect: Teleport 8 spaces, this does not trigger opprotunity attacks
wizard.description: Sink into the ground, leaving a sticky sludge where you once were

wizard.name: Molasses
wizard.hit: Target is Dazed (1) and Slowed (1). The user can use their action to continue adding Afflictions on as many consective turns as they'd like. This effect also ends if the caster takes damage from any source.
wizard.description: Bring your enemies to a halt, making them wade through battle incredibly slowly

wizard.name: Toil and Trouble
wizard.trigger: When inflicting an enemy with an affliction
wizard.description: Double Double, Toil and trouble, fire burn, and afflictions bubble

book of fire.name: Dragon Blast
book of fire.effect: Ground remains scorched. Any targets that move over the scorched spaces take your attribute in damage.
book of fire.miss: Targets are shifted one space to the side.
book of fire.description: With a growl, a rumble, and then a volcanic blast, you create a forward jet of super hot flames.

book of fire.name: Flamethrower
book of fire.description: Like the breath of a dragon, this plume of fire engulfs and destroys whatever it touches.

book of fire.name: Ring of Fire
book of fire.effect: Create a ring of fire along the edge of the burst. All targets leaving or entering the ring are subject to a Vitality/Intellect/Force VS Grit or take your spell damage. Lasts for 2 turns.
book of fire.description: The caster creates a ring of fire, sectioning off a portion of the battlefield.

book of fire.name: Scalding Skin
book of fire.effect: Deal 1d4 to adjacent enemies at the start of your turn.
book of fire.description: Fire and heat swirl about your body, constantly scorching those around you.

book of fire.name: Wildfire
book of fire.effect: These spaces Ignite. Every turn, all ignited spaces may spread to 2 adjacent spaces of the casters choice. A target passing over an ignited space takes guaranteed attribute damage: ally, self, or enemy.
book of fire.description: You send out 3 seperate wisps, each lighting a small spark. Although, those sparks begin to spread into mighty blazes.

book of fire.name: Scorch the Earth
book of fire.effect: Effected ground remains scorched, any character that moves into a scorched space takes your spell damage again.
book of fire.description: The caster raises hellfire from the ground, scorching it to unbelievable heat. Those who tread must face the flames.

runemaster.name: Rune of Binding
runemaster.hit: Weapon + Intellect Damage, and the target is Immobilised (1)
runemaster.description: You strike the enemy and freeze them in place with your Spell Style

runemaster.name: Rune of Diminishing
runemaster.hit: Int Damage, and the Enemy is Numbed (1)
runemaster.description: Striking your enemy, you leave them fumbling at their blade.

runemaster.name: Rune of Staggering
runemaster.hit: Weapon Damage, and the target is knocked back spaces equal to your Intellect to a minimum of 2.
runemaster.description: Your attack explodes in your spell style, pushing back the enemy.

runemaster.name: Rune of Suction
runemaster.hit: Pull target 3 spaces towards you. Disoriented (1)
runemaster.description: You use your runes to pull a foe into your deadly grasp.

runemaster.name: Lockdown Rune
runemaster.description: You use a rune that chains up opponents in place around you.

runemaster.name: Rune of Aggression
runemaster.hit: Weapon + Intellect Damage. The enemy must attack you on its next turn.
runemaster.miss: The enemy must attack you on its next turn.
runemaster.description: You aggrivate the enemy, forcing them to face and attack you

runemaster.name: Rune of Protection
runemaster.effect: Every attack made against you has it's damage reduced by an amount equal to your Intellect. The effect lasts until the end of your next turn
runemaster.description: You use your runes to empower your defense for a short time.

runemaster.name: Rune of Reflection
runemaster.trigger: A ranged attack misses you and you have a target in range
runemaster.hit: Reflect the attack at new target
runemaster.description: Using powerful runes, you absorb a blast of magic and hurl it back.

runemaster.name: Explosive Rune
runemaster.hit: Weapon + Intellect Damage. Any characters adjacent to the target is pushed 3 spaces. Target is shifted 3 spaces of your choosing.
runemaster.description: You make a melee strike that explodes in a powerful blast of force, seperating your enemies.

runemaster.name: Rune of Cursing
runemaster.hit: Target is Weakened (1). At the end of the targets turn, the user rerolls the attack roll. of this ability. On a hit, the Weakened (1) condition reapplies. On a miss, the target clears all Weakened. Continue to reroll at the end of the target's turn every turn until either combat ends or the attack misses.
runemaster.description: You cripple your opponent by striking them with a deadly curse, sucking their strength from them.

runemaster.name: Rune of Sealing
runemaster.hit: 2 Weapon + Intellect Damage. The enemy cannot use Spell attacks for the next 2 turns.
runemaster.description: You seal your opponents ability to cast magic.

runemaster.name: Rune of Trapping
runemaster.hit: If the target moves, willingly or unwillingly, before the start of your next turn, the target takes 2d6 + Intellect damage
runemaster.description: You seal your opponent in a trap of magic chains, but they shred any who try to escape.

warrior.name: Brutal Strike
warrior.description: An inaccurate but powerful melee attack

warrior.name: Cleave
warrior.hit: Weapon + Strength damage, and a different enemy adjacent to you takes damage equal to your Strength.
warrior.description: Make a wide attack that can strike two foes.

warrior.name: Defensive Stance
warrior.hit: Weapon Damage. Until the start of your next turn, if the target tries to attack you, it does so with disadvantage.
warrior.description: A safe attack that trades damage for defense

warrior.name: Precision Strike
warrior.description: A consistent and accurate melee attack

warrior.name: Brace
warrior.description: Brace for the next attack, reducing it's impact.

warrior.name: One More Time
warrior.trigger: After missing an melee attack or ability
warrior.description: If at first you don't succeed...

warrior.name: Spin Attack
warrior.description: Make a powerful attack against anyone unlucky to be next to you.

warrior.name: Thick Skin
warrior.effect: Attacks that deal equal to or less than 5 damage have no effect on you
warrior.description: You shrug off attacks that prick your skin.

warrior.name: Extreme Force
warrior.description: When absolutely need to do a lot of damage right away.

warrior.name: My Turn!
warrior.trigger: If an ally deals more than 10 damage to an enemy adjacent to you
warrior.effect: Make a standard attack against the same enemy.
warrior.description: Follow up on an allies attack with your own melee attack.

warrior.name: Parry and Counter
warrior.trigger: When an enemy targets you with a melee attack against your defence and misses
warrior.effect: Make a follow up attack against the target.
warrior.description: You have a quick reaction time, responding to your attacker with deadly force.

warrior.name: Planted
warrior.description: Become an immovable object, firm and planted in any battle.

berserker.name: All Out Attack
berserker.description: With a reckless overexertion of power, you make a deadly attack.

berserker.name: Bashing Skulls
berserker.description: You aggress the enemy witha  threatening headput, but may end up doing more harm than good.

berserker.name: Blood Rage
berserker.effect: When you take damage, add +2 damage to your next attack, up to a max of +6. Dealing damage reduces bonus damage back to 0.
berserker.description: Each hit against you floods you with rage, powering up your strikes.

berserker.name: Rage
berserker.effect: All attacks have advantage, all attacks against you have advantage. Can be toggled on or off.
berserker.description: With a thunderous roar, you go into a blind rage, attacking with no regard for defense.

berserker.name: Berserk
berserker.effect: Can be toggled on or off. See hit effects for toggled on effects. Toggling requires a Strength VS 10 attack.
berserker.hit: All attacks have advantage, all attacks against you have advantage. +4 damage to attacks.
berserker.description: Your veins swell and your adrenaline pumps, your muscles swell with power.

berserker.name: Fight For Your Life
berserker.effect: If you start your turn below 1/2 HP, gain inspired (1)
berserker.description: When the going gets tough, the tough become unstoppable.

berserker.name: Reckless Abandon
berserker.miss: Enemy gets an attack of opportunity
berserker.description: Make a vulnerable risky strike, potentially leaving yourself open to be parried.

berserker.name: Relentless Force
berserker.effect: Repeated attacks against the same enemy add +2 damage. Max +6.
berserker.description: Sometimes, you just need to hit something a few times before it drops.

berserker.hit: Lose 1/2 current HP, Weapon damage + HP lost by ability
berserker.description: You put everything you have and a little more into an all out slam.

berserker.name: Devils Wager
berserker.effect: Double the damage of your next attack. If it does not kill the enemy, take the damage onto yourself aswell.
berserker.description: You make a deal with a dark power, strengthening your attack for a gamble of power.

berserker.name: Raging Roar
berserker.description: Let out a roar from the bottom of your lungs, embracing all the fury you have! (But don't forget to breath!)

berserker.name: Return the Favor
berserker.hit: You add damage taken to your next attack
berserker.description: If you take a hit, you have to dish it back right.

champion.name: Command
champion.effect: The Target makes a basic attack and adds your Force to damage on a hit.
champion.description: Give an order to an ally, having them charge into the fray and strike with your courage behind them.

champion.name: Distracting Swipe
champion.hit: 2 Weapon + Strength + Force. One ally adjacent to you or the target can move up to their speed, this movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.
champion.description: Using a powerful strike you buy time for an ally to escape the fight.

champion.name: Double Team
champion.effect: After you make the attack, one ally within range also makes a basic attack against the same target.
champion.description: What's better than one attack? Two!

champion.name: Inspiring Strike
champion.hit: Weapon + Strength damage. One ally within 5 spaces gains Inspired (1)
champion.description: You rip down the enemy in a brutal attack, and call upon your allies to do the same.

champion.name: Heroic Inspiration
champion.hit: 2 Weapon + Strength Damage. An ally within 5 spaces is cleared of 2 Afflictions
champion.miss: An ally within 5 spaces is cleared of 2 Afflictions
champion.description: Tearing through the fray, your allies find the will to fight alongside you, no matter the pain or injuries they have sustained.

champion.name: Invigorating Motivation
champion.effect: After you make the attack, one Ally within range can make any action as long as the attack only targets one character and target's the same target
champion.description: You call out a warcry before making a valiant attack, and an onlooking ally is rallied to action!

champion.name: Rallying Smash
champion.effect: All player character allies within range 15 gain Inspired (1)
champion.description: Making a heroic strike, you call your allies to fight on with a newfound thirst for battle!

champion.name: Revitalizing Strike
champion.hit: Weapon damage. You or one ally within 5 spaces heals up to your Force.
champion.miss: One ally within 5 spaces heals up to your Force.
champion.description: You strike down the enemy in front of your battle worn allies. Your courage wills them to fight on!

champion.name: Bolstering Bash
champion.hit: Weapon damage. You heal 3 Force. If you have any allies adjacent, this healing can be shared any way with them.
champion.miss: You heal equal to your Force
champion.description: Smashing away a foe, you find yourself ignited by the heat of battle!

champion.name: Forward Charge
champion.effect: Before making this attack, you can move up to your speed towards an enemy. After making this attack, an ally within 5 spaces of you now or from where you started can move up to their speed towards an enemy and make an At-Will action.
champion.description: Moving up together, you make a coordinated strike against the enemy.

champion.name: Glorious Victory
champion.effect: Give one ally in range Inspired (1).
champion.description: Your valor inspires your teammates, and you charge off to your next fight.

champion.name: Ironheart Slash
champion.effect: You or an adjacent ally gain a bonus to Defense equal to your Force until the end of your next turn
champion.description: You make a defensive slash, putting yourself in a planted position to brace yourself or cover an ally.

spellblade.name: Blink
spellblade.effect: You Teleport up to 5 spaces away. If you teleport next to an enemy, the next attack you make against that enemy before the end of your next turn has advantage.
spellblade.description: Teleport around the battlefield and surprise your foes.

spellblade.name: Hunter's Warp
spellblade.effect: Once per combat at any point in a round, you may use this ability to teleport adjacent to the last enemy you dealt damage to. If the enemy was in the process of moving, they must stop or provoke an opprotunity attack.
spellblade.description: Your strike leaves a lingering mark on a foe, and once you call upon it's power, you return for more.

spellblade.name: Spellslash
spellblade.description: A powerful attack that uses your knowledge of magic and your mastery of your blade.

spellblade.name: Weapon Warp
spellblade.description:
You use telekinesis to launch
your weapon at nearby enemies, causing your weapon to zip
through the air at deadly speed, then return to your hand.

spellblade.name: Blink Strike
spellblade.effect: Before making the attack roll, you teleport between 3-5 spaces.
spellblade.description: Warp around and strike the foe with a powerful magic slash.

spellblade.name: Ethereal Half-Step
spellblade.effect: After making this attack, you become Shielded (1)
spellblade.description: As part of this attack you step partially into an ethereal plane, allowing for attacks to phase through you, dealing less damage to your physical body.

spellblade.name: Vertical Blink Strike
spellblade.description: Suddenly teleport into the air above where you currently are and swing down with the full weight of gravity onto an unsuspecting foe

spellblade.name: Weapon Kinesis
spellblade.effect: Make two attacks against one character
spellblade.description: You telekinetically launch your weapon at a nearby space, your weapon spins and tears through the space at violent speeds before returning to your hand.

spellblade.name: Horizon Walk
spellblade.effect: When you use this ability, you Vanish. At the end of the round, you reappear in any space within 20 spaces from where you Vanished. If you are in melee range of an enemy, you can make the attack.
spellblade.description: Not as fast as other teleports, but certainly further and more potent.

spellblade.name: Phase Pair
spellblade.hit: You and your target are teleported up to 5 spaces away. You must remain adjacent to eachother at your destination. If the target is an enemy, you can attack the enemy with Dexterity VS Defense, on hit 2 Weapon + Dexterity + Intellect damage.
spellblade.description: Grab an enemy and pull them through your portal with you, making a powerful strike on the way.

spellblade.name: Tear in Space
spellblade.effect: Teleport to a space up to 7 spaces away from you. Every character in a line from your original position to your new position is targetted
spellblade.description: Dash through your foes, slashing through subspace to warp past them, leaving them wrecked in your wake.

shapeshifter.name: Wild Form
shapeshifter.effect: See Wild Form rules in the rulebook for more details.
shapeshifter.description: You take the form of a powerful creature.

shapeshifter.name: Elemental Origins
shapeshifter.effect: As part of equipping this ability, you may use 1 XP to unlock any one ability from any of the Books, ignoring regular tier unlocking rules. You can cast this ability in and out of your Wild Form as normal, so long as you have the required Spell Style. You do not need Wild Form equipped to use this ability.
shapeshifter.description: Your Wild Form has some elemental powers, be it a fire golemn or a water nymph. You may use these powers even in your transformation.

shapeshifter.name: Permanent Stinger
shapeshifter.effect: If you have Wild Form equipped, this ability costs 1 AP. You always have the Stinger trait, even when not transformed. This Trait counts towards your maximum amount of Traits. If you have Polymorph equipped, you can choose to change this Trait, but you won’t have Stinger Permanently until you use Polymorph to change it back.
shapeshifter.description: A stinger portrudes from your body, dripping with a sickly poison.

shapeshifter.name: Permanent Wings
shapeshifter.effect: If you have Wild Form equipped, this ability costs 1 AP. You always have the Wings trait, even when not transformed. This Trait counts towards your maximum amount of Traits. If you have Polymorph equipped, you can choose to change this Trait, but you won’t have wings permanently until you use Polymorph to change it back.
shapeshifter.description: Wings portrude from your back, letting you soar through the sky with ease.

shapeshifter.name: Rapid Transformation
shapeshifter.effect: The first time you use Wild Form in a combat, use a Free Action, as opposed to an action. Ending Wild Form is now always a Free Action.
shapeshifter.description: You shift in and out of your form in the blink of an eye, mixing up your combat frequently.

shapeshifter.name: Additional Trait
shapeshifter.description: Your wild form is more complex than most, going to show your mastery over your craft.

shapeshifter.name: Dramatic Transformation
shapeshifter.effect: Whenever you use wild form, all enemies adjacent to you are targetted by this attack
shapeshifter.hit: Vitality/Strength damage, knocked back two spaces
shapeshifter.description: Your transformation is a brilliant blast of power, knocking back any who are too close to you.

shapeshifter.name: Permanent Camoflauge
shapeshifter.effect: If you have Wild Form equipped, this ability costs 1 AP. You always have the Camouflage trait, even when not transformed. This Trait counts towards your maximum amount of Traits. If you have Polymorph equipped, you can choose to change this Trait, but you won’t have Camouflage permanently until you use Polymorph to change it back.
shapeshifter.description: Your skin can blend in with it's surroundings, and you dissapear into thin air.

shapeshifter.name: Permanent Sludge
shapeshifter.effect: If you have Wild Form equipped, this ability costs 1 AP. You always have the Sludge trait, even when not transformed. This Trait counts towards your maximum amount of Traits. If you have Polymorph equipped, you can choose to change this Trait, but you won’t have Sludge Permanently until you use Polymorph to change it back.
shapeshifter.description: Your body seeps with a sickening sludge, and you can slather your foes in it.

shapeshifter.name: Emergence
shapeshifter.effect: You can use all equipped abilities while transformed.
shapeshifter.description: Mastering your wild mind, you may use any of your abilities while transformed.

shapeshifter.name: Gigantic Form
shapeshifter.effect: When you use Wild Form, your character grows to take up a blast 3 of space. You also gain an additional trait. You can only transform if there is space, however this space can be created using Dramatic Transformation. You don’t have to transform into a Gigantic Form, but you won’t have the additional trait.
shapeshifter.description: You grow in size to become a massive beast, ready to lay havoc on those who dare oppose it.

shapeshifter.name: Polymorph
shapeshifter.effect: You can change any or all of your traits as a Free Action. This ability cannot be used while in Wild Form even if you have Emergence.
shapeshifter.description: You are a master of many shapes, changing your Wild Form at a whim.

shapeshifter.name: Second Soul
shapeshifter.effect: Create a second Health Pool equal to your maximum health. When you are in your Wild Form, use this Health instead of your main Health. If this Health is reduced to 0, you instantly transform back into your normal state, and continue to use your main health. Any damage you take below 0 in your Wild Form transfers to your main health.
shapeshifter.description: Your wild form and you are two different but combined beings. Your wild form absorbs damage for you.

knight.name: Knockdown Sweep
knight.hit: Weapon + Strength damage. You knock the target prone.
knight.description: With a powerful strike, you place your target onto their bottom.

knight.name: Push Back
knight.hit: Weapon + Strength Damage. If the enemy is equal or smaller in size to you, push it back one space. You may follow into the formerly occupied space without triggering reaction attacks.
knight.description: Following a backhand swing, you bring your arms to bear and push forward.

knight.name: Sentinel
knight.trigger: Can be used in place of an opportunity attack
knight.description: Those who think they can get past your iron wall are fools at best.

knight.name: Stop Resisting!
knight.effect: If the attack hits, make the attack roll again, up to a maximum of 4 attacks with this action.
knight.description: You make a series of strikes with a blunt end of your weapon, overwhelming your foe.

knight.name: Aggressive Double Strike
knight.effect: Make two attacks on the same target. If both hit, the target is dazed (1)
knight.description: Make two quick and deadly attacks, staggering your opponent with their force.

knight.name: Bash Attack
knight.hit: Strength Damage. The next time the target attacks you before the start of your next turn, their first attack has disadvantage.
knight.description: Using a quick bash, stagger your opponent, giving you a brief respite.

knight.name: Run Down
knight.effect: You can move up to 5 spaces before making the attack roll. This movement does not trigger opportunity attacks
knight.hit: 3 Strength Damage and the target is knocked prone
knight.description: Make a deadly charge with your weapon, taking down the enemy with raw momentum.

knight.name: Variable Flashy Strike
knight.effect: Hit or miss, until the end of the targets turn, if made with Slashing, the target is Slowed (1). If Crushing, the target is Dazed (1). If Piercing, the target is Weakened (1).
knight.description: You swish and whirl your weapon in a practiced and distracting flurry before bearing down on your opponent. The effect depends on the weapon you use.

knight.name: Dominating Attack
knight.description: A strike with such force that it leaves the target out of their wits for a moment

knight.name: Overwhelming Double Strike
knight.effect: Make two attacks on the same target. If both hit, the target is weakened (1). Additionally, any opportunity attack made against the target until the end of their next turn is a critical hit.
knight.description: Make two quick and deadly attacks, leaving them ripe for the picking.

knight.name: Stay Back!
knight.description: Strike a critical piece of your opponents offense, giving them a momentary disadvantage.

knight.name: Taunting Strike
knight.hit: 2 Weapon + Strength damage. Every enemy adjacent to you must target you next turn if they choose to make an Attack.
knight.description: Nothing says come at me like a big old wallop!

adventurer.name: Agile
adventurer.effect: You can use your Action to grant you an additional Move activity.
adventurer.description: You are quick on your feet, able to make a mad dash for your destination if the need arises.

adventurer.name: Extra Loadout
adventurer.description: You are a user of many weapons, and carry a wide variety on you at all times.

adventurer.name: Hybrid Weapon
adventurer.effect: Choose one of your weapon loadouts and choose a specialization that isn't tied to this weapon. You can learn one ability (Using 1XP, ignoring Specialization buy-in) of that specialization and use this weapon to meet it's requirement. If the specialization you chose uses a different damage type, then this weapon can choose to deal either damage type whenever it deals damage with any ability.
adventurer.description: Your weapon has many uses. From a flaming sword, to a transforming weapon, or even a bayonetted rifle, your weapon serves more than one purpose.

adventurer.name: Spell Strike
adventurer.description: A basic spell attack, making a simple offensive strike in the style of your magic.

adventurer.name: Tough
adventurer.effect: When you become Battered, roll twice on the Battered chart and choose one result.
adventurer.description: You are not easy to take down, and are resilient in the darkest battles.

adventurer.name: Weapon Toss
adventurer.effect: After the Attack, your weapon lands in the same space as the target. You can retreive your weapon as a Free Action when standing on or adjacent to the weapon.
adventurer.description: Hurl your weapon across the battle to close the distance between you and your foe.

anatomist.name: Adrenaline Shock
anatomist.effect: The target recieves one Action Surge. This Action Surge must be used on their next turn or it is discarded.
anatomist.description: Give an ally a burst of energy, giving them superhuman strength for a brief moment.

anatomist.name: Mana Enhancers
anatomist.effect: For the next two turns, the target adds Advantage to attack and +6 to Damage for all attacks that use Vitality, Intellect, or Force
anatomist.description: You give your target a dose of magic enhancing aether. It swirls through their body that gives them a temporary jolt of power.

anatomist.name: Patch Wounds
anatomist.description: You quickly tend to a fresh wound, but risk doing more harm than good in the heat of battle.

anatomist.name: Power Surge
anatomist.effect: For the next two turns, the target adds advantage on attack and +6 to Damage for all attacks that use Strength or Dexterity
anatomist.description: You give your target a rush of strength, giving them unreal physical might, creating a powerful force in the battle.

anatomist.name: Experimental Formula
anatomist.description: Greatly increase your physical abilities at the cost of your awareness.

anatomist.name: Patch Deep Wounds
anatomist.description: You rush the patching process, getting more work done but also increasing the risk of damage.

anatomist.name: Risky Injection
anatomist.effect: 3 Intellect Heal. Inspired (3), Staggered (1), Disoriented (1), Numbed (1).
anatomist.description: A powerful burst of strength, but it leaves the user in incredible pain.

anatomist.name: Toxin Cleanse
anatomist.hit: The target is dispelled of all poison and heals 1d4. The amount of poison the target had + the amount just healed is converted into a damage bonus on the next attack they land before combat ends
anatomist.description: A potion that washes the system of poison, and converts it into energy, healing minor wounds and strengthening the body.

anatomist.name: Compound X
anatomist.hit: The allies next attack is guaranteed to be a critical and cannot miss.
anatomist.description: A dangerous injection which gives one ally a short burst of lethal precision.

anatomist.name: Do No Harm
anatomist.effect: If an ally under the influence of one of your status buffs defeats an enemy, you both heal 1d10
anatomist.description: All of your creations are imbued with vampiric power, and absorb health for themselves and their master.

anatomist.name: Immunity Overcharge
anatomist.description: Enhance your targets resilience, giving them a chance to recover.

anatomist.name: Manic Operation
anatomist.hit: Target is healed from their lingering battered conditon and heals to half health rounding up. For the next two turns, the Target adds +5 to attack rolls and +5 to damage on hit
anatomist.miss: Same as On Hit effect, but at the end of the target's second turn, they drop to one Heatlh and fall prone (1)
anatomist.description: Force the target to send their body into overdrive, but if it isn't done right, you may put your patient in a precarious situation.

crusader.name: By Any Means
crusader.effect: Take 1d8 + 5 Damage. All Conditions, buffs and afflictions, are removed.
crusader.description: Your greater purpose breaks through any chain that binds you. Your resolve fills your mind and returns you to a neutral state.

crusader.name: Intervention
crusader.trigger: When a nearby ally is hit by an attack
crusader.effect: You can use your reaction to have the hit effect target you instead. Move adjacent to the ally.
crusader.description: This world will only cherish the memory of the selfless and not the selfish.

crusader.name: Luminous Smite
crusader.effect: Heal HP equal to your Force
crusader.description: You strike down your foe and leave them in shambles before your heavenly might.

crusader.name: Radiant Smite
crusader.effect: Heal HP equal to your Force
crusader.description: Cut down the enemy with holy power behind your strike.

crusader.name: Desperate Smite
crusader.description: You overextend yourself for a powerful strike, but leave yourself weakened in the aftermath.

crusader.name: Embodiment of Courage
crusader.effect: Until the end of combat, the damage you would take from attacks that target Grit is halved.
crusader.description: You are unmoving, a pillar of radiant strength.

crusader.name: Heroic Smite
crusader.description: Divine purpose fills you as you make a powerful strike in the name of your creed.

crusader.name: Sacrificing Smite
crusader.description: A powerful strike, but at the cost of your own vitality.

crusader.name: Brilliant Smite
crusader.description: Restore your vitality with a destructive heroic strike.

crusader.name: Not Today
crusader.effect: While Bleeding Out, use this Free Action to regain 2d8 + For Health and stand up.
crusader.description: When all hope is lost, you will rise above in glory.

crusader.name: Sacred Purpose
crusader.effect: Until the end of combat, the damage you would take from attacks that target Defense are reduced by an amount equal to your Force to a minimum of 1 damage.
crusader.description: Faith is my shield, and my sword is the powers of heaven.

crusader.name: Will of Steel
crusader.description: You can take hits that would put weaker targets in the ground, your will is steel and your resolve is iron!

leader.name: Flag of Speed
leader.hit: As long as allies start their turn within 5 range of the flag, they gain Hasted (1). The flag has 1HP and it's defensive stats are 10.
leader.description: A totem that allows allies to blitz around the battlefield.

leader.name: Flag of Strength
leader.hit: As long as allies remain within 3 range of the flag, they have Inspired (1). The flag has 1HP and it's defensive stats are 10.
leader.description: A totem that fills those around it with enhanced strength

leader.name: Shout of Strides
leader.effect: All Allies move up to 3 spaces. This movement provokes opportunity attacks.
leader.description: You call to your allies a prerehearsed battle plan, allowing them to reposition.

leader.name: Stick Together
leader.effect: Add your Force to the damage.
leader.description: Sticking together as a group boost the morale!

leader.name: Flag of Fortitude
leader.hit: As long as allies remain within 3 range of the flag, attacks made against them have disadvantage. The flag has 1HP and it's defensive stats are 10.
leader.description: A totem that grants a veil of protection

leader.name: Flag of Life
leader.hit: Heal 1d6 to all within 3 range of the flag at the start of your turn. The flag has 1HP and it's defensive stats are 10.
leader.description: A totem with restorative properties. It cures the wounds of those nearby.

leader.name: War Horn
leader.effect: The first time an ally makes an attack while standing in the aura, they do so with advantage. If you move, the aura will remain centerred on you. The aura lasts until the end of your next turn. This move cannot stack with itself.
leader.description: You blow through a glorious horn, inspiring those around you.

leader.name: Ancesteral Cry
leader.effect: Grant all allies in range Inspired (2)
leader.description: You yell out to your allies, motivating them to fight harder!

leader.name: Form Up
leader.hit: All allies effected can choose to move up to their speed towards you. This movement does not provoke opprotunity attacks.
leader.description: You call your allies back to you, linking up for the fight.

leader.name: Rally Cry
leader.hit: Hasted (1), Inspired (1), and add your Force to their damage for their next turn.
leader.description: You rally your allies together, giving them a beacon of hope. Together, you charge in and face the foe in a united attack!

leader.name: Watch My Back
leader.effect: If 2 or more allies are adjacent to you, attacks made against you have disadvantage
leader.description: There's nothing more potent then working together. Three heads are always better than one.

warden.name: Come To Me
warden.effect: Roll once for all targets. Allies may decide if they are pulled or not.
warden.hit: Pull the targets on the field one space towards you. This action does not provoke attack of opprotunity.
warden.description: Using powerful magic, pull everyone towards you with an etheral force.

warden.name: Depth Strikes
warden.description: Giant spikes erupt from the ground, striking 3 unexpecting foes.

warden.name: Growth
warden.effect: You can only have one growth at a time. Creating a new growth ends the old growth.
warden.hit: The space becomes damaging terrain. Any who pass over it take your spell damage. Using this ability again will cause the growth zone to expand to Burst 5, and once more to become Burst 7
warden.description: A frestering growth in the spell style of the caster spreads and crawls along the ground.

warden.name: Strand Swarm
warden.effect: Roll once, use that result for every enemy
warden.description: Unleashing a swam of vines in your spell style that coil around your enemies, leaving them restrained.

warden.name: Barricades
warden.hit: A barricade is raised in each of the 7 spaces. Each barricade cannot be traversed on land and has 1 HP.
warden.description: Raise 7 magical barriers up, taking control of the battlefield.

warden.name: Bubble Shield
warden.hit: Create a bubble in a 2 space radius around yourself that blocks ranged attacks from outside the bubble. Lasts until the start of your next turn.
warden.description: The caster creates a dome barrier that blocks incoming projectiles and spells. Although, enemies and allies can still move freely in and out of the barrier.

warden.name: Mass Positional Shift
warden.effect: Roll once, use that result for every enemy
warden.hit: Target is shifted 3 spaces. This movement does not provoke opprotunity attacks.
warden.description: Reposition the enemies to your will.

warden.name: Skyfall
warden.effect: Roll for each target. Allies are not hit by this attack.
warden.description: Unleash a rain of magic power, striking down your enemies in the radius with a hail of your spell style.

warden.name: Blinding Light
warden.description: The caster releases a blast of light, and all those who don't avert their eyes are staggered by the brightness.

warden.name: Gravity Well
warden.hit: All enemy characters are tossed into the air. They levitate 15 ft off the ground, and cannot move or take melee actions. They also cannot be melee attacked. At the start of your next turn, all affected characters are slammed into the ground, taking your Spell damage.
warden.description: Toss all your foes into the air, letting them linger there a moment, before throwing them to the earth with brutal force.

warden.name: Obelisk
warden.hit: An obelisk rises from the effected space. All enemies within range 5 of the obelisk who have Grit lower than the attack roll are immobilised. To end this effect, they must do one of 2 things. 1. Be helped up by an ally (free action) or 2. the obelisk is destroyed (Defensive stats = 10. Health = 25)
warden.description: You create a godly monument to some god, and all who witness it drop to their knees in hypnotic prayer.

warden.name: Spellbolts
warden.effect: Make 3 attacks, your attacks must attack different targets. At the start of your next 2 turns, make 3 attacks again.
warden.description: You launch 3 bolts of energy into the air which hunt their targets. After hitting their targets these bolts continue to fly and remain under your control for the next short while.

book of psychic.name: Numbing Prison
book of psychic.description: The caster traps their target in their own bodies, numb to the world around them.

book of psychic.name: Possess Legs
book of psychic.hit: Shift the character up to their movement in any direction. Attribute damage.
book of psychic.description: Like a puppetmaster, the caster leads the target around however they may like.

book of psychic.name: Self Mutilation
book of psychic.hit: Make the enemy basic attack themselves once.
book of psychic.description: There are few things more horrifying than watching a man dismantle himself, especially when they're bent to do it against they're will.

book of psychic.name: Sensory Shutdown
book of psychic.description: The caster shuts down the enemies primary senses, greatly inhibiting their ability to do anything.

book of psychic.name: Turncoat
book of psychic.hit: Force the character to basic attack or use an at-will ability on an ally in range. If the target does not have an ally to attack, this spell has no effect.
book of psychic.description: The caster saps into the mind of their target, making them forget whose side they're on.

book of psychic.name: Ego Death
book of psychic.hit: Target character goes into a frenzy for 2 turns. Will attack closest allies or enemies without regard. Character may only use at-will abilities or basic attacks in this time.
book of psychic.description: The caster blocks the foes memories, turning them into a feral fight or flight monster.

thrown mastery.name: Bait the Enemy
thrown mastery.hit: 2 Weapon + Attribute Damage, Pulled up to 4 spaces.
thrown mastery.description: Lure enemies into your grasp with your throwing weapon

thrown mastery.name: Flank Strike
thrown mastery.effect: You can only use this ability if there is at least one ally adjacent to the target and you are not adjacent to the target.
thrown mastery.description: Back up an ally by attacking their target.

thrown mastery.name: Guard the Flanks
thrown mastery.trigger: The enemy moves into or within range of this attack.
thrown mastery.description: A reactive throw to protect your team from ambushes or surprise strikes.

thrown mastery.name: Hit and Run
thrown mastery.effect: Move up to 2 spaces after making the attack.
thrown mastery.description: Stay quick on your feet as you loose thrown weapons at your enemy.

thrown mastery.name: Oversized Thrown Attack
thrown mastery.effect: Move up to 3 spaces towards the target before the attack roll. If you move at least 2 spaces, add 1d8 damage to the attack roll.
thrown mastery.description: Run forwards to wind up for a hefty throw, launching your thrown weapon with immense power

thrown mastery.name: Overwhelm the Flank
thrown mastery.effect: You can only use this ability if there is at least one ally adjacent to the target and you are not adjacent to the target.
thrown mastery.description: Decimate an enemy in combat with one of your allies, leaving them exposed for attack

thrown mastery.name: Roving Barrage
thrown mastery.effect: Make two attacks, both can target the same character or each can target a different one. If both attacks hit, gain an extra Move this turn.
thrown mastery.description: Let loose your throwing weapons in a rapid moving barrage

book of water.name: Healing Rain
book of water.effect: It begins to rain drops of rejuvenating water. Every character (including enemies) in the burst heals 2 Attribute health.
book of water.description: Summon the gift of rain, restoring all those who bathe in its warmth.

book of water.name: Hydropump
book of water.description: The cast fires a pump of water, pushing back those trying to approach.

book of water.name: Sailors Knot
book of water.effect: Both rolls need to be successful or the attack fails.
book of water.hit: Spell damage + Attribute. Targets are pulled into each other and meet in the middle.
book of water.description: Tie two enemies together with a rope of water before slamming them together.

book of water.name: Saturation
book of water.effect: Heal 1d8. Using this ability on the same ally again increases healing to 1d12
book of water.description: Heal an ally using special water magic techniques. Using it again is even more effective.

book of water.name: Waterwhip
book of water.description: The caster lashes a long whip of water, dealing high mid-range damage.

book of water.name: Tsunami
book of water.hit: A tsunami forms. Create a five space line. As soon as you cast it, and at the start your next turn, the line sweeps five spaces away from you. Everyone caught in the sweep is targeted by you for a Vitality/Intellect/Force VS Reflex attack. Being hit by this attack deals 2 Spell damage + Attribute
book of water.description: The caster raises an enourmous wall of water, and pushes it forwards, mowing down anything in it's path.

cavalier.name: Mount
cavalier.effect: Your character gains a mount. See Mount in the Rulebook.
cavalier.description: You have a loyal steed, ready to carry you around the battle

cavalier.name: Simple Command
cavalier.effect:
Command your mount to do any one of the following. The mount will perform the action to the best of its ability:
Come to me: The mount will use it’s speed to move as close as adjacent to you.
Get Away: Your mount will move away from you up to it’s speed.
cavalier.description: Give your mount a basic task

cavalier.name: Charge Attack
cavalier.effect: Move up to your mount's speed and then make an attack. You must at least move 3 spaces to use this Ability.
cavalier.description: You charge forward with your mount, smashing into the enemy with your weapon and steed.

cavalier.name: Rearing Strike
cavalier.description: Your Mount rises up on its hind legs or something similar, and strikes down with their weight.

cavalier.name: Ride-By Attack
cavalier.hit: 2 Weapon + Strength, and the target cannot make opportunity attacks against you until the end of this turn.
cavalier.description: You dash past your target and strike from the back of your mount.

cavalier.name: Speed Training
cavalier.description: Your mount is well trained and very fast.

cavalier.name: Cycle Charge
cavalier.effect: Move up to your mount's speed and then make an attack. You must at least move 3 spaces to use this Ability. Hit or miss, after the attack roll you may move up to your mount's speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
cavalier.description: Get in, get out, and hit them again. Such is the life of the cavalry.

cavalier.name: Deft Saddling
cavalier.effect: While mounted and whenever you are knocked prone, roll a Vitality VS 10. On a success, you are not knocked prone.
cavalier.description: Stay upright, no matter the odds. Your saddling is a cut above the rest.

cavalier.name: Hind Leg Smash
cavalier.description: Your Mount spins around and rams the enemy, sending them flying backwards.

cavalier.name: Mount and Rider Strike
cavalier.effect: Make two attacks as defined in the Attack and Hit descriptions
cavalier.attack: Strength VS Defense + Vitality VS Defense
cavalier.description: Your Mount and you both strike at the same time at the same target

cavalier.name: Flying Mount
cavalier.effect: Your Mount permanently has the Flying condition
cavalier.description: Your mount takes to the sky, controlling the battle from the air.

cavalier.name: Mount and Rider Takedown
cavalier.effect: If both attacks hit, then the target cannot use a Move until the end of their next turn (which means they can't stand up or crawl)
cavalier.attack: Strength VS Defense + Vitality VS Reflex
cavalier.hit: 2 Weapon + Strength AND 1d10 + Vitality and Target is knocked prone.
cavalier.description: You attack together with your mount with a brutal strike.

cavalier.name: Rush Attack
cavalier.hit: Weapon + Vitality + Strength Damage and the target is knocked prone.
cavalier.description: Charge down your target and leave them for the crows.

cavalier.name: Shock Charge
cavalier.effect: Move up to your mount's speed and then make an attack. You must at least move 3 spaces to use this Ability.
cavalier.description: You courageously charge forward without a hint of holding back

unarmed fighting mastery.name: Body Shield
unarmed fighting mastery.hit: Disoriented (1) and Rooted (1). User is Rooted (1). Until the end of your next turn, any Attacks that target you instead target the target of this attack.
unarmed fighting mastery.description: Grab an enemy and pull them in the way of strikes that may hit you

unarmed fighting mastery.name: Chokehold
unarmed fighting mastery.hit: 2 Weapon + Attribute Damage, Rooted (1). User is Rooted (1).
unarmed fighting mastery.description: Hold the enemy in a tight grip, crushing them in your strength

unarmed fighting mastery.name: Elbow Drop
unarmed fighting mastery.hit: 2 Weapon + Attribute Damage and knocked prone. You are Inspired (2).
unarmed fighting mastery.description: A flashy melee strike that sends you into a powerful burst of strength

unarmed fighting mastery.name: Forceful Punch
unarmed fighting mastery.hit: Weapon + Attribute Damage. Roll 1d4, on a 1: Slowed (1). On a 2: Immobilised (1). On a 3: Weakened (1). On a 4: Disoriented (1).
unarmed fighting mastery.description: A powerful punch that could have a wide variety of effects

unarmed fighting mastery.name: Forward Kick
unarmed fighting mastery.hit: Weapon + Attribute Damage, Knockback (2). The user follows 2 spaces.
unarmed fighting mastery.description: Send an enemy tumbling backwards, and advance with them.

unarmed fighting mastery.name: Grapplehold
unarmed fighting mastery.hit: Target is Stunned (1), Rooted (1). User is Rooted (1).
unarmed fighting mastery.description: Hold down an enemy to give your team time to act

unarmed fighting mastery.name: Ground Slam
unarmed fighting mastery.hit: Weapon + Attribute Damage, Immobilised (1) and knocked prone.
unarmed fighting mastery.description: Slam an enemy into the ground, leaving them in their place

unarmed fighting mastery.name: Quick Grab
unarmed fighting mastery.description: A quick grab that holds you an your target in place, while still allowing you to act

sniper.name: Careful Shot
sniper.description: You make a precise shot with your ranged weapon

sniper.name: Double Shot
sniper.effect: Make two attacks, each must be against a different character. Choose one attack to have advantage.
sniper.description: What's better than one arrow? Two!

sniper.name: Skirmish
sniper.hit: Weapon + Dexterity Damage, and you can move 3 spaces. This movement does trigger opportunity attacks
sniper.description: Quickly dash after maing your shot, taking cover or moving that extra tad more.

sniper.name: Sniper Post
sniper.description: Forego movement in favor a of another shot!

sniper.name: Hold the Point
sniper.effect: Any movement unused at the end of your turn is added to the damage of your next attack. Max +5.
sniper.description: Plant your feet and take your shot, increasing your precision.

sniper.name: Overwatch
sniper.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each enemy that moves within your range you may make a basic attack against.
sniper.description: Keep watch over the battlefield, pinning down those that try to reposition

sniper.name: Point Blank
sniper.hit: Weapon Damage. If this attack has Advantage, this attack deals 2 Weapon + Dexterity damage
sniper.description: Who says you can't use a bow in a knife fight?

sniper.name: Split Shot
sniper.effect: Make two attacks, each must be a different character. The targets must be within 5 spaces of each other.
sniper.description: Make two quick but powerful ranged attacks

sniper.name: Bowbreaker Arrow
sniper.hit: Closest target: 2 Weapon Damage + Dexterity. All other targets: Weapon Damage + Dexterity
sniper.description: Pushing your weapon to it's limits, you loose a powerful ranged attack that pierces through foes.

sniper.name: Powershot
sniper.description: Push your weapon to it's limits to unleash a brutal ranged attack

sniper.name: Returning Fire
sniper.effect: You may use this ability to make a standard attack back against them, as long as the target is in range.
sniper.description: Fire back at your attacker with a quick ranged attack

sniper.name: Robinhood
sniper.effect: Make two attacks, if both attacks hit, the second attack deals an extra damage equal to your Dexterity
sniper.description: Strike the enemy twice in a row in quick succession.

beastmaster.name: The Beast
beastmaster.effect: Grants your character a Beast. See Beast rules in the rulebook.
beastmaster.description: Two bodies are better than one, and the bond between the owner and the beast knows no bounds.

beastmaster.name: Beast Toss
beastmaster.effect: This ability MUST be equipped on the Beast. The Beast throws it's owner up to 5 spaces.
beastmaster.description: The beast hurls it's owner, launching them a fair distance

beastmaster.name: Bonded Lifeforce
beastmaster.effect: Transfer up to 20HP between the Beast and the Owner
beastmaster.description: You and your beast have a bond greater than any other, and may share your own spirit with one another.

beastmaster.name: Loyal Beast
beastmaster.hit: If the owner or the beast is bleeding out, the owner or the beast may use this ability to stabilize them to 1d10 HP
beastmaster.description: You and your beast have a bond like no other, never leaving each other for any danger.

beastmaster.name: Mount Beast
beastmaster.effect: Mount your Beast, Beast gains Hasted (1) upon mounting. You may both take actions and move as one unit, damage will hit your beast first. Rider can use Cavalier abilities that require 'mounted.'
beastmaster.description: Riding your beast is not as easy as a regular mount, but it will make do.

beastmaster.name: Beast Swap
beastmaster.description: Opening an arcane channel using your bond, swap spaces with your beast.

beastmaster.name: Beefier Beast
beastmaster.effect: Beast gains +2 to all defensive stats
beastmaster.description: Your beast has thick skin, and can withstand powerful attacks

beastmaster.name: Command Beast
beastmaster.effect: Grants the Beast an extra action this turn
beastmaster.description: Give your beast an order, allowing them to take an extra turn.

beastmaster.name: Recall Beast
beastmaster.effect: The Beast moves adjacent to the owner. This provokes attacks of opprotunity if relevant.
beastmaster.description: Your beast heeds your call, coming back to your aid.

beastmaster.name: Gigantic Beast
beastmaster.effect: The Beast is 3 spaces in diameter. It gains +20 HP.
beastmaster.description: Your beast is no measly creature, but a massive beast of epic proportions.

beastmaster.name: Guardian Beast
beastmaster.effect: The Beast (or the owner, whichever is not being attacked) is within range 5, the Beast may move adjacent and take the damage instead.
beastmaster.description: Always watching each others backs, together you protect each other.

beastmaster.name: Sic em!
beastmaster.effect: Add the Owners Vitality to damage everytime the Beast deals damage.
beastmaster.description: Your beast is a deadly hunter, that hunts it's owners prey.

beastmaster.name: Team Attack
beastmaster.effect: If the Beast (or the owner, whichever did not attack) is within range 5, they move adjacent to the target and attack.
beastmaster.description: You and your beast are an incredible tag team, following up on each others attacks

leader.name: Watch Out!
leader.trigger: Ally within range is targeted, but before the attack roll
leader.effect: You may use this reaction to grant them Shielded (1).
leader.description: Keeping an eye on the battle, you give an ally a heads up to an incoming attack

mender.name: Cure Wounds
mender.description: Using basic healing magic, heal an ally from afar

mender.name: Dispel
mender.effect: Target clears an affliction, or is cleared of all ongoing damage.
mender.description: The caster casts magic on their ally, curing an impairment and returns them to the fray.

mender.name: Healing Beam
mender.description: Channel a beam of healing, helping all allies in its path.

mender.name: Healing Wisp
mender.effect: Make this check at the start of your next turn. Make a separate check for every character.
mender.description: You send out three wisps that float away and heal allies.

mender.name: Fountain of Health
mender.description: Create a stream of healing in a small area, supporting teammates who stick together.

mender.name: Healing Bolt
mender.hit: 1d8 heal, if another ally is within 3 range of target, it jumps to them. Can hit all targets.
mender.description: A burst of healining energy that jumps from ally to ally.

mender.name: Purging Spell
mender.effect: Can be used on an enemy or a willing ally.
mender.hit: Clear all afflictions and conditions. Spell damage.
mender.description: A potent dispel that clears any and all afflictions on a target, but may sting a little.

mender.name: Regrowth
mender.description: A powerful regenerative magic, restoring a large pool of health in a big area.

mender.name: Cleansing Pulse
mender.effect: All allies in range clear any 3 Afflictions
mender.description: Calling upon a higher power, the caster cures their nearby allies of their impairments.

mender.name: Divine Chosen
mender.effect: They gain 1d6 healing at the start of every turn until the end of combat.
mender.description: Give an ally the gift of the gods, restoring their wounds as time goes on

mender.name: Linked Fates
mender.effect: Your health values are now linked. Attacks now deal half damage to both of you, and healing heals half for both of you.
mender.description: Connect your soul to another, bearing some of their load or absorbing some of their healing.

mender.name: Unto Me
mender.effect: Take as many affliction points away from an ally as you would like and place them onto yourself.
mender.description: Using your spell style, you pull the ailments of your ally onto yourself.

crushing mastery.name: Bash Down
crushing mastery.description: Using your blunt weapon, bring your foe to the ground.

crushing mastery.name: Concuss
crushing mastery.description: A risky but potent blow to the enemies weakness, leaving them open to attack.

crushing mastery.name: Crush
crushing mastery.description: Your weapon rends your foe with raw force.

crushing mastery.name: Shatter Armor
crushing mastery.effect: You can only use this attack if the target's Defence is 14 or higher.
crushing mastery.description: Decimate your targets defenses with a ruthless attack

crushing mastery.name: Sweeping Smash
crushing mastery.description: Make a wide attack that is nearly undodgeable.

crushing mastery.name: Wide Swing
crushing mastery.description: A reliable and heavy strike that can crush a highly armored target.

crushing mastery.name: Will-Breaker
crushing mastery.description: A strike with enough force to put fear in any foe.

ranged mastery.name: Blunt Arrow
ranged mastery.hit: 2 Weapon + Dexterity Damage and the target is knocked prone.
ranged mastery.description: An arrow with a blunt end that slams into foes with massive force

ranged mastery.name: Bomb Arrow
ranged mastery.hit: Weapon + Dexterity Damage. Target is Dazed (1)
ranged mastery.description: An explosive arrow that can distract enemies and buy time for your allies

ranged mastery.name: Fire Arrow
ranged mastery.description: A flaming arrow that sears the skin of your enemies

ranged mastery.name: Ice Arrow
ranged mastery.hit: Weapon + Dexterity Damage. Target is Rooted (1) and Slowed (1)
ranged mastery.description: An ice arrow that chills your enemies to the floor, rendering them immobile

ranged mastery.name: Poison Arrow
ranged mastery.hit: Weapon + Dexterity Damage. The target is Poisoned (5).
ranged mastery.description: An arrow dripping with a vile poison that saps away at the life of its target

ranged mastery.name: Shock Arrow
ranged mastery.hit: 2 Weapon Damage. The target is Stunned (1)
ranged mastery.description: An arrow that launches an electrical current through it's target, stunning them for a moment.

ranged mastery.name: Silver Arrow
ranged mastery.hit: 2 Dexterity Damage. This attack ignores disadvantage or damage reductions from conditions, and ignores resistance to Radiant damage.
ranged mastery.description: An arrow made of rare enchanted metals, it can penetrate defenses and resistances of any sort.

book of ice.name: Freeze
book of ice.hit: Enemy is completely frozen. They are Paralyzed (1).
book of ice.description: The caster chills an enemy to their core, turning them completely frozen if only for a few seconds.

book of ice.name: Frostbite
book of ice.description: The caster cools the air, reducing a small pocket of space to freezing temperatures.

book of ice.name: Ice Cover
book of ice.effect: Create a 10ft wall of ice. It has 1 hp or can be destroyed on command. Defensive stats = 10. All adjacent characters are attacked upon summoning the wall.
book of ice.hit: Deal spell damage to all enemies adjacent to the wall.
book of ice.description: The caster raises a wall of ice from the ground, and melt it whenever they may choose.

book of ice.name: Slowing Ray
book of ice.description: The caster fires a precise ray of frost, slowing the movement of those it strikes.

book of ice.name: Speed Skate
book of ice.hit: Move up to 2x your speed. All spaces moved across are frozen. Enemies moving across frozen spaces are knocked prone.
book of ice.description: The caster creates blades of ice beneath their feet, and skates across any surface.

book of ice.name: The Big Chill
book of ice.description: A blast of cold air unparraleled by any other magic, the caster freezes everything around them, slowing any who are remotely near the sub zero pulse.

assassin.name: Air Attack
assassin.effect: This attack has advantage if you are at a higher altitude than the enemy. Move adjacent to the enemy.
assassin.description: Leap from above, taking down the enemy with deadly force.

assassin.name: Backstab
assassin.effect: Target must be adjacent one of your allies
assassin.description: You sneak up behind a preoccupied enemy and strike them for heavy damage.

assassin.name: Dazing Strike
assassin.effect: You can shift one space after the attack without triggering opportunity attacks
assassin.description: Make a quick and viscous attack, taking the opening to reposition.

assassin.name: Skillful Swordplay
assassin.hit: Dexterity Damage OR Staggered (1), your choice
assassin.description: A cleverly placed strike that can be switched at the last moment for one of two effects.

assassin.name: Easy Target
assassin.description: Slow down your target, making them even easier prey.

assassin.name: Execution
assassin.description: Finish off a downed enemy with a merciless strike.

assassin.name: Pocket Sand
assassin.description: You toss gravel from a pouch, blinding your opponent for a brief attack opprotunity.

assassin.name: Poison Dart
assassin.description: Fire a poisonous projectile at your target, pricking them with a stinging venom.

assassin.name: Blinding Barrage
assassin.description: Strike with a flurry of rapid attacks, sending blinding sparks into the eyes of your enemies.

assassin.name: Killing Blow
assassin.description: Weakened enemies make the best targets, and you take the best swing you can.

assassin.name: Snake Strike
assassin.description: Weave through your targets attacks, tripping them up and landing a powerful blow.

assassin.name: Viper Strike
assassin.description: Slick your attack with poison, slinging it over your opponent as you strike.

piercing mastery.name: Bleeding Wound
piercing mastery.effect: If the total result of your attack roll is 15 or higher, add 5 Damage + Bleed (5) to the Hit.
piercing mastery.description: Puncture your target deeply, leaving them leaking with blood

piercing mastery.name: Forward Lunge
piercing mastery.effect: If the total result of your attack roll is 15 or higher, add 2 Weapon Damage + Push 1 Space to the Hit.
piercing mastery.description: Leap forwards and force your opponent back with your combat ability.

piercing mastery.name: Impale
piercing mastery.effect: If the total result of your attack roll is 15 or higher, add 2 Weapon Damage to the Hit.
piercing mastery.description: A potent strike that target the vitals, and upon striking, can deal massive puncture damage.

piercing mastery.name: Puncture
piercing mastery.effect: If the total result of your attack roll is 15 or higher, add 2 Weapon Damage to the Hit.
piercing mastery.description: A potent strike that target the vitals, and upon striking, can deal additional puncture damage.

piercing mastery.name: Skewer
piercing mastery.effect: If the total result of your attack roll is 12 or higher, add Attribute Damage to the Hit and Miss.
piercing mastery.description: A powerful and consistent attack that can chip away at powerful foes.

piercing mastery.name: Stab and Twist
piercing mastery.effect: If the total result of your attack roll is 15 or higher, make the attack on the same target once more.
piercing mastery.description: Make your opponent crumble in pain as you twist your weapon within them

piercing mastery.name: Sudden Lunge
piercing mastery.trigger: Can be used in place of an opprotunity attack
piercing mastery.effect: If the total result of your attack roll is 18 or higher, add 5 Damage + Bleed (5) to the Hit.
piercing mastery.description: A deadly reactive attack that leaves your enemy bleeding and wounded.

trapper.name: Alertness
trapper.effect: The enemy recieves no benefit from ambushing you, and at the start of any combat, you may move up to your speed as a reaction
trapper.description: There's nothing you haven't seen. Your experience tells you what to expect.

trapper.name: Caltrops
trapper.effect: maximum 5 caltrops at a time. If you place another, you must choose one to disapear
trapper.hit: Leave caltrops in an adjacent space. Any character that is in the space occupied by caltrops takes 1d6 damage and gain slowed (1)
trapper.description: Throw down sharp metal to shred opponents who step on them.

trapper.name: Safe Strike
trapper.hit: Weapon Damage and move 2 spaces away from target
trapper.description: Using your adept dodging skills, weave out of an enemies zone of control while striking them.

trapper.name: Sneaking Sprint
trapper.hit: Move up to your speed, enemies cannot target you unless you are the closest target. AoE's may still hit you. This effect lasts until the start of your next turn.
trapper.description: Your feet are light as feathers, and you glide across the ground, drawing no attention to yourself.

trapper.name: Hide in Plain Sight
trapper.hit: No enemy can attack you for 2 turns, effect ends if you attack an enemy.
trapper.description: Dissapear out of sight, taking the chance to set up for when you reappear.
