trapper.name: Pitfall Trap
trapper.effect: This trap uses hidden trap rules
trapper.hit: Place a pitfall trap. The first enemy to step on the trap is immobilized (2) and takes 2d10 damage. The trap is destroyed after activating
trapper.description: Lay a trap on the ground. It loosens the ground beneath it, causing those unfortunate enough to step on it to become trapped.

trapper.name: Smoke Bomb
trapper.hit: All attacks made against or by characters (Friend or foe) within the smoke are made at disadvantage
trapper.description: Tossing a small explosive on the ground, the area around you is shrowded in dark smoke.

trapper.name: Trip Wire
trapper.effect: This trap uses hidden trap rules
trapper.hit: Place a trip wire. Any enemy that moves over the spaces is knocked prone and stopped in their tracks.
trapper.description: Leave a near invisible wire that catches opponents at their ankles, knocking them to the floor.

trapper.name: Expert Dodger
trapper.description: A master of dodging enemy strikes, you never fear being hit while moving past a foe.

trapper.name: In the Shadows
trapper.effect: When line of sight cannot be drawn to any enemies, gain +4 speed.
trapper.description: You are a master of the shadows. A quick blade in the dark.

trapper.name: Landmine
trapper.effect: This trap uses hidden trap rules
trapper.hit: If a character steps on the landmine, or a ranged attack is made against it (Defense stats are 10), the mine will explode. All characters within 2 range of the mine take 4d10 damage.

trapper.name: Last Ditch Effort
trapper.trigger: When an attack targets your Reflex or Defence
trapper.effect: The attack is made with disadvantage
trapper.description: You make a fight or flight call, leaping out of the way of a dangerous strike.

book of radiant.name: Astral Healing
book of radiant.hit: Restore the ally to max HP. They cannot take damage until the end of their next turn.
book of radiant.miss: Restore 1/2 of the allies max HP
book of radiant.description: Using a secret prayer, call upon a long forgotten god to perform an ancient and powerful rite.

book of radiant.name: Divine Healing
book of radiant.description: Call upon a heavenly power to perform a miracle, healing your ally with potent magic

book of radiant.name: Gift of Life
book of radiant.effect: Transfer up to 5HP from yourself to an ally. May only be used once per round.
book of radiant.description: Give a small portion of your strength to an ally in need.

book of radiant.name: Searing Beam
book of radiant.effect: Choose a space adjacent to your character, then draw the line in any direction you choose. You or any allies would still be targetted if caught in the line.
book of radiant.description: Meld the feet of your foes to the ground with this searing beam that radiates from the earth.

book of radiant.name: Sun Laser
book of radiant.description: Unleash a beam of radiant power, dealing unbelievably potent damage.

book of radiant.name: Resurrect
book of radiant.hit: Character is brought back to life with 5 HP
book of radiant.description: The caster pulls the targets soul back from the dead, returning them to the mortal world.

book of necrotic.name: Death Mark
book of necrotic.effect: The target is marked for death. If the marked for death character dies before the start of your next turn, heal 20 HP.
book of necrotic.description: The caster bargains with a dark power, and in return, is granted a great boon of strength.

book of necrotic.name: Forced Aging
book of necrotic.description: The target is aged, shortening their lifespan by an unknown amount.

book of necrotic.name: Leech
book of necrotic.hit: Become a leech to your target. At the start of your turn, roll an Attribute VS 10. If you pass, steal Attribute health from the target. Max 3 times.
book of necrotic.description: You hook into the heart of your target with dark magic, sucking out their very life force.

book of necrotic.name: Lifesteal
book of necrotic.hit: Spell Damage. Heal for damage done.
book of necrotic.description: The caster sucks the soul out of their target, taking it's strength for their own.

book of necrotic.name: Vampire
book of necrotic.hit: Spell Damage + Attribute. Heal for 2x damage done.
book of necrotic.description: The caster sucks blood from the target, recovering health in turn.

book of necrotic.name: Chaos Division
book of necrotic.hit: Reduce opponents current HP by 1/2. Heal equal to that amount.
book of necrotic.description: All things in the Universe can be divided into smaller, more insignifcant parts.

book of earth.name: Clashing Rocks
book of earth.effect: At the start of your next turn, leaves a stone pillar in it's place that blocks ranged attacks. It has 15HP and defensive stats are 10.
book of earth.hit: Rocks begin to close in on the target. Make the attack roll at the start of your next turn. If the target moves, willingly or unwillingly, before the start of your next turn, the attack misses. 2 Spell damage + Attribute.
book of earth.description: Two rocks rise from the ground and slam together, catching those too slow to escape their clasp.

book of earth.name: Hurl Boulder
book of earth.effect: The rock blocks line of sight and acts as cover. It has 10HP and defensive stats are 10.
book of earth.hit: Spell Damage. Leave a rock in the effected space and target character is knocked back one space.
book of earth.miss: Leave a rock in the effect space. Target character must move to an adjacent space of their choice.
book of earth.description: The caster tosses a massive stone through the air, creating a block on the battlefield upon a brutal impact.

book of earth.name: Rock Cover
book of earth.hit: Create a 10ft wall of stone. Breaks line of sight for both sides, the wall has 20 hp, if it hits 0 all sections of the wall collapses into dust.
book of earth.description: The caster bends the earth to make a large stone wall.

book of earth.name: Rock Mail
book of earth.description: Rocks crawl around the user, turning them into a golem like figure.

book of earth.name: Stone Sentry
book of earth.hit: Reduce damage taken by your casting attribute. Lasts until you move. You cannot be moved unwillingly.
book of earth.description: Trading all movement for a rock solid shell, the caster becomes an immovable but nigh unkillable object.

book of earth.name: Terraform
book of earth.effect: The space directly underneath you is raised to 30ft. All adjacent spaces around it are raised to 20ft. All spaces adjacent to those spaces are raised to 10ft.
book of earth.description: Raise the Earth beneath you, creating a massive mountain

dual wield mastery.name: Bloodthirst
dual wield mastery.effect: Make 3 attacks, the attacks can target the same or different characters.
dual wield mastery.description: Make a flurry of lacerating attacks against your enemy.

dual wield mastery.name: Deadly Double Strike
dual wield mastery.effect: Make 2 attacks, the attacks can target the same or different characters.
dual wield mastery.description: Make two powerful attacks with your weapons

dual wield mastery.name: Dual Strike
dual wield mastery.effect: Make 2 attacks, the attacks can target the same or different characters.
dual wield mastery.description: Make two quick attacks with your weapons.

dual wield mastery.name: Flurry
dual wield mastery.effect: Make 4 attacks, the attacks can target the same or different characters.
dual wield mastery.description: Unleash a burst of deadly attacks, ripping through a foe.

dual wield mastery.name: Surging Flourish
dual wield mastery.effect: Make 2 attacks, the attacks can target the same or different characters.
dual wield mastery.description: Make a set of attacks that surprise your foes, leaving them distracted for a brief moment.

dual wield mastery.name: Twin Snare Strikes
dual wield mastery.effect: Make 2 attacks, the attacks can target the same or different characters.
dual wield mastery.description: Keep your foes on lockdown, prey for your fangs.

dual wield mastery.name: Whirlwind
dual wield mastery.effect: Make 3 attacks that each target different characters.
dual wield mastery.description: Being surrounded is worse for your attackers than it is for you

duelist.name: Combat Spirit
duelist.description: You plant your feet and lay into the enemies was deadly focus.

duelist.name: Flurry of Strikes
duelist.effect: If the attack hits, attack again with disadvantage. If that attack hits, attack again with disadvantage. You cannot move between these attacks, but you can target other characters within melee range.
duelist.description: You unleash a deadly barrage of punches, striking your foe in a constant volley

duelist.name: Now's My Chance!
duelist.effect: Add 2 Dexterity to your next attack. If the attack misses, this bonus is lost.
duelist.description: Put extra force into an attack, at the gamble of potentially whiffing it.

duelist.name: Surge Strike
duelist.hit: Weapon + Dexterity damage. You gain Inspired (1)
duelist.description: Momentum is the key to victory, and it all starts with your first strike!

duelist.name: Critical Moment
duelist.effect: Until the end of this turn, your next attack roll is automatically a 20 (critical).
duelist.description: The enemy has left you a critical opening, and you seize the opprotunity with a powerful attack.

duelist.name: Dance Like a Butterfly
duelist.trigger: When an attack that targets your defence or reflex misses
duelist.effect: Deal an extra 1d6 damage on your next melee attack that hits before the end of your next turn.
duelist.description: Dodge with your expertise, positioning yourself for an opprotune strike.

duelist.name: Lingering Wound
duelist.hit: 2 Weapon + Attribute damage. Once per round, the target takes 1d4 damage after making any attacks on it's turn.
duelist.description: You open a leak in your enemies spirit, making their own motion harm them.

duelist.name: Vital Strike
duelist.effect: You can also target a willing ally. The attack automatically succeeds.
duelist.hit: Weapon + Dexterity damage and heal an amount equal to the damage you dealt.
duelist.description: Strike your foe with an ancient technique, pulling their vitality into yourself.

duelist.name: If I Breath
duelist.effect: When in a state of Bleeding Out, you can still perform all actions as normal as if you still had health. You must still roll for Death Marks as normal, and upon reaching 3 Death Marks, you will still Die.
duelist.description: Even when your body is ready to quit, you keep fighting, finding the strength to push yourself even further past your limits.

duelist.name: Reorient
duelist.effect: End one of the following conditions currently afflicting you. Blinded, Numbed, Disoriented, Weakened.
duelist.description: You take a deep breath and clear an ailment within your mind.

duelist.name: Shieldbreaker
duelist.hit: Weapon + Dexterity damage. Remove all conditions from the enemy.
duelist.description: Your attack is so viscous that any strength the enemy had mustered is crushed in a moment.

duelist.name: You're Mine!
duelist.effect: Until the end of combat, your first attack every turn against the target has advantage
duelist.hit: 2 Dexterity Damage. The Target is Paralyzed (1)
duelist.description: Hit the enemy with a crippling attack, and expose a weakness ripe for your picking.

alchemist.name: Acid Flask
alchemist.hit: Spell + Intellect Damage. Take Intellect Damage at the start of their next turn
alchemist.description: Hurl a small vial of corrosive sludge at your target, burning away their armor and flesh.

alchemist.name: Firecracker
alchemist.description: Toss a small explosive, searing your opponents ankles with white hot sparks.

alchemist.name: Flame Flask
alchemist.hit: Spell + Intellect Damage. The target can either use an action on their next turn to remove the flames or take Weapon + Intellect damage at the end of their next turn.
alchemist.description: Toss a make shift molotov at your enemy, bursting them into flames. If they don't put them out, there could be consequences.

alchemist.name: Glue Ball
alchemist.description: The caster tosses a ball of sticky glue, slathering their target to whatever surface they touch. The rock hard subtance locks them in place.

alchemist.name: Explosive Shard
alchemist.description: The caster throws a hissing black ball that bursts into a cloud of scrap. Anyone too close takes a shredding.

alchemist.name: Flash Bomb
alchemist.description: The caster tosses an enchanted concoction, exploding into a brilliant burst of light

alchemist.name: Sticky Bucket
alchemist.description: Throw out a bucket of sludge, slathering your enemies with a thick and sticky substance.

alchemist.name: Tar Bomb
alchemist.description: Sticky black tar weighs down oncoming attackers

alchemist.name: Boiling Bomb
alchemist.description: Using a secret home recipe, you create a improvised explosive glass bomb, wounding and staggering those you attack.

alchemist.name: Cementing Sludge
alchemist.description: You hurl a bucket of hardening sludge that soaks your target, turning them hard as stone for a brief opprotunity.

alchemist.name: Deathcloud
alchemist.effect: Make an attack roll every time a character first occupies the cloud. The cloud lasts until the end of your next turn.
alchemist.description: Toss a glass vial that erupts with smoke, smoke that chokes anyone who breathes it in.

alchemist.name: Stun Powder
alchemist.description: You toss forwards a shimmering glitter, that when met with enough oxygen bursts into a bright explosion.

book of arcane.name: Arcane Knowledge
book of arcane.hit: Learn the targets current HP, Defense, grit, Reflex, and will
book of arcane.description: Using the arcane arts, you magically analyze the enemy, learning their weaknesses.

book of arcane.name: Cloak of the Mists
book of arcane.effect: The next time an attack targets you and only you, it is made with disadvantage, and this effect ends. If you take damage in any way, this effect also ends.
book of arcane.description: Surround yourself in a veil of mist, making your body more difficult to hit.

book of arcane.name: Decoy Illusion
book of arcane.hit: Create a decoy, it has 10hp and can be moved every turn. Enemies will target the illusion as opposed to the player first.
book of arcane.description: The caster creates a duplicate of themself, and is magically enhanced to draw attention.

book of arcane.name: Disguise
book of arcane.hit: Make an Intellect VS Will attack on all enemies that you intend to fool. If you fail even one of them, the effect fails. If you pass all of them, these characters make actions against you at a disadvantage for the rest of the round.
book of arcane.description: The caster morphs their form, changing their appearence to any other humanoid form.

book of arcane.name: Flight
book of arcane.description: The caster moves through the air and traverses normally impassable terrain.

book of arcane.name: Mana Driver
book of arcane.hit: Whenever your character is airborne or flying, you may use this ability. Smash into the ground and deal spell damage to all adjacent.
book of arcane.description: You stop midair and slam to the ground, creating a magical blast on impact.

book of arcane.name: Arcane Truth
book of arcane.hit: Learn the targets current HP, Defense, Grit, and Reflex. In addition, the target is staggered (1).
book of arcane.description: Using ancient magic, you discover the enemies weaknesses and leave them open for attack.

spellbow.name: Dread Arrow
spellbow.hit: The target is weakened (1) and staggered (1)
spellbow.description: This arrow passes overhead an enemy, filling them with fear and draining their will to fight.

spellbow.name: Ethereal Arrow
spellbow.effect: This attack ignores line of sight and cover
spellbow.description: This arrow can fire through any surface to find it's foe.

spellbow.name: Recourse Arrow
spellbow.effect: If this attack misses, you can reroll the attack roll against a different opponent within Weapon range of the original target.
spellbow.description: An arrow that always tries to find it's mark, sailing through the air to attack a foe if it misses.

spellbow.name: Suppressor Arrow
spellbow.description: This arrow does no damage, but fires a shockwave at the foe that weakens their body.

spellbow.name: Dizzying Arrow
spellbow.description: Once this arrow punctures skin, the target will find themself woozy and unable to stand.

spellbow.name: Rending Arrow
spellbow.hit: 2 Weapon + Dexterity Damage. Roll Intellect VS Grit, on a hit add Weakened (1)
spellbow.description: This arrow sucks away at the life fore of the foe, crippling their body.

spellbow.name: Restraining Arrow
spellbow.hit: Weapon + Intellect Damage, Disoriented (1) and Immobilised (1)
spellbow.description: Upon hitting it's target, this arrow releases magical threads which bind the target termporarily.

spellbow.name: Venomous Arrow
spellbow.hit: Weapon  + Intellect Damage and Intellect Poison
spellbow.description: An arrow soaked with a deadly black poison

spellbow.name: Ground Piercer
spellbow.description: An arrow flies in an upward arc, then dives straight down, pinning the target's leg to the ground.

spellbow.name: Implosion Arrow
spellbow.hit: 3 Weapon + Intellect damage. All enemies as well as any allies of your choice within range 3 is pulled as close to the target as possible
spellbow.description: This arrow pulls everything nearby like a vortex towards your target.

spellbow.name: Spacetime Arrow
spellbow.hit: 2 Intellect damage. Swap spaces with target.
spellbow.description: This arrow hits your foe and folds space around you, swapping your positions.

spellbow.name: Unwavering Arrow
spellbow.effect: As long as there is a path to the target, it always hits. 2 Weapon Damage.
spellbow.description: A tracking arrow that will follow it's foe to the ends fo the earth.

necromancer.name: Bloodpools
necromancer.hit: Create a pool of blood. All characters moving through a bloody space costs 2 movement.
necromancer.description: You create a thick red pool of curdling blood, bringing all who step their feet to grinding halt.

necromancer.name: Corpse Wave
necromancer.description: You send forth a wave of flesh, blood, and bone. Most run in fear, some are caught in the torrential wave.

necromancer.name: Skeleton Legion
necromancer.effect: Summon 3 Skeletons (One in each space) Maximum of 9 Skeletons controlled by you at any time.
necromancer.hit: Each Skeleton has 1 HP, and they can move 1 space at the end of your turn each. THe skeletons do not block ranged attacks.Nothing can move through the skeletons but the creator.
necromancer.description: Summon a band of skeletons, each one a mindless shambling husk. Have more movement than their zombie counterparts.

necromancer.name: Zombie Wall
necromancer.effect: Maximum of 15 Zombies controlled by you at any time.
necromancer.hit: Create a wall of Zombies. Each Zombie has 1HP, and they cannot move. The zombies do not block ranged attacks. Nothing can move through the zombies but the creator.
necromancer.description: You raise mindless corpses from the earth to stand in the way of your foes.

necromancer.name: Hideous Monstrosity
necromancer.hit: Summon a Hideous Monstrosity. Nothing can move through the Hideous Monstrosity. It has 30HP and deals Spell damage to all adjacent characters (Force VS Defense) at the start of the casters turn.
necromancer.description: Using terrible dark magic, you bring to life a being which should have never been given form.

necromancer.name: Puppet Corpse
necromancer.hit: Ressurect the character with 1HP. They can make a move and an action immediately. For the rest of combat or until the character dies, it can move and make a basic attack at the start of your turn.
necromancer.description: Control a lifeless body, using it as if it were your own, even turning it against your old allies

necromancer.name: Rise!
necromancer.effect: You can now have up to 25 zombies and 15 skeletons
necromancer.description: Your summons feed of your grid of dark magic energy.

necromancer.name: Shocking Horror
necromancer.effect: If the player must end their turn within range of the ghoul, they must still try to move as far away from the ghoul as possible.
necromancer.hit: Summon a terrifying ghoul. No characters can end their turn within range 2 of the ghoul, although they can move in and out of this radius during their turn.
necromancer.description: You create a ghoul that whails a terrible scream at those nearby, filling them with too much dread to stay near.

necromancer.name: Charibdys Pit
necromancer.hit: Summon the Charibdys. At the start of your turn, all characters within range 5 of the Charibdys are pulled 3 spaces towards it. After this, all characters adjacent to the Charibdys take your Spell Damage.
necromancer.description: From the dark pits of hell you call upon a vile monster to grapple and consume your foes.

necromancer.name: Crypt Guard
necromancer.effect: Summon a Crypt Guard. The Crypt Guard cannot be destroyed by any means but by creating a new Crypt Guard. The Crypt Guard can only make opprotunity attacks, see attack and hit for details. The Crypt Guard has 30HP and all defensive stats are 14. The Crypt Guard cannot move.
necromancer.description: Crypt Guards are stoic and noble undead fighters, that will guard their point with eternal devotion.

necromancer.name: Ghastly Wyrm
necromancer.hit: Draw a line across the battlefield. All targets along this line take Spell damage. The spaces remain dangerous, any character that moves through the line is slowed (1) and takes Spell damage.
necromancer.description: Call upon an undead dragon to strafe the battlefield with toxic fire.
necromancer.proposed_changes: This could be a Warden ability

necromancer.name: To Ashes
necromancer.hit: Destroy all of your summons. All adjacent characters take 2 Spell + Force damage. Stacks up to 3 times.
necromancer.description: In an instant, you destroy your summons in a blaze of dark magic.

scoundrel.name: Get Back Here!
scoundrel.effect: Your weapons have +1 reach when you make an attack of opprotunity.
scoundrel.description: You are not one to let anyone run past, and reach out hold back your foes.

scoundrel.name: Lunge Strike
scoundrel.effect: You can move up to 3 spaces before the attack, this movement triggers opportunity attacks
scoundrel.description: You make a quick dash and a potent strike

scoundrel.name: Swap
scoundrel.effect: Switch spaces with a willing ally, this movement does not provoke opprotunity attacks.
scoundrel.description: Use an ally to move up a little further or change up your game play.

scoundrel.name: Watchful Strike
scoundrel.hit: Weapon + Dexterity. If the target attacks you before the start of your next turn, you may use your reaction to make an Attack roll that deals Weapon Damage on a hit.
scoundrel.description: Keep an enemy pinned down with your attack, following up if they try any funny business.

scoundrel.name: Charge
scoundrel.effect: Move adjacent to target, must take shortest path.
scoundrel.hit: Weapon damage + Dexterity. Target knocked prone.
scoundrel.description: Charge at your target and push them down! (Or maybe trip yourself up...)

scoundrel.name: Enhanced Opportunity Attacks
scoundrel.effect: Add Dexterity to every opportunity attack you make.
scoundrel.description: It always hits harder when they're not facing you

scoundrel.name: Maneuvering Strike
scoundrel.effect: Before or After you make the attack, you can move to any space surrounding your target without provoking opportunity attacks.
scoundrel.description: Dance around your enemy with fleet footing and deadly strikes.

scoundrel.name: Trick Positioning Strike
scoundrel.hit: Weapon + Dexterity. You shift the target one space. This does not trigger an opprotunity attack.
scoundrel.description: Hit the enemy to knock them into a new position

scoundrel.name: Devious Counter
scoundrel.trigger: Can be used in place of an opprotunity attack
scoundrel.effect: Instead of doing a basic attack of opportunity, you may instead use any of your abilities on the target
scoundrel.description: You are always one step ahead, using anything your arsenal to punish an out of place foe.

scoundrel.name: Heroic Dive
scoundrel.trigger: Ally within range is targeted, but before the attack roll
scoundrel.effect: You may use this reaction to move adjacent to the ally and become the target of the attack instead.
scoundrel.description: You are always ready to throw yourself on the line for your team.

scoundrel.name: Knockback Barrage
scoundrel.hit: 3 Weapon + Dexterity, and shift the target one space. Move into targets original space.
scoundrel.description: Strike the enemy with a rapid flurry of hits, pushing them back.

scoundrel.name: Rogish Outburst
scoundrel.hit: 2 Weapon + Dexterity and they push back 1 space. You can use your reaction to make an opportunity attack.
scoundrel.description: A powerful double strike that forces the enemy backwards.

thaumaturge.name: Dispelling Blast
thaumaturge.hit: Spell damage + Vitality. All allies within range 3 of the target clear 1 Affliction.
thaumaturge.description: A blast of magic power that dispels the ails of nearby allies.

thaumaturge.name: Divine Blessing
thaumaturge.trigger: When an ally in range makes an attack, but before the attack roll
thaumaturge.effect: On hit, they add 2 Force damage to targets next attack. On Miss, there is no effect.
thaumaturge.description: The caster calls upon a holy power, and uses the blessing to smite down their foes.

thaumaturge.name: Duality Strike
thaumaturge.attack: Vitality VS Defense (enemy) OR Vitality VS 10 (Ally)
thaumaturge.hit: On enemy: Spell damage, On ally: Spell heal
thaumaturge.description: Magic is about balance, will you use your power to destroy? Or create?

thaumaturge.name: Illuminating Blast
thaumaturge.hit: Weapon + Vitality damage. One ally within 2 spaces of the target gains Inspired (1).
thaumaturge.description: Use your magic to strike the enemy, enhancing the power of a nearby ally as well

thaumaturge.name: Fleet Feet
thaumaturge.hit: Target gains Hasted (1). If the target does any damage before the effect wears off, it resets.
thaumaturge.description: The caster enhances their target, allowing them to move slightly faster than before.

thaumaturge.name: Healing Blast
thaumaturge.hit: Spell damage + 2, heal an ally within 5 range of target equal to the damage dealt.
thaumaturge.description: Strike an enemy with your spell style, and restore a nearby allies wounds.

thaumaturge.name: Mage Armor
thaumaturge.description: Using their spellstyle, the caster enshrowds their target with magic armor.

thaumaturge.name: Sword Dance
thaumaturge.hit: Target gains Inspired (1). If the target does any damage before the effect wears off, it resets. Max 3 turns.
thaumaturge.description: You fill your ally with an invigorating strength, and they dance through the frey with deadly precision.

thaumaturge.name: Accelerating Magic
thaumaturge.effect: After defeating an enemy, all allies within range 5 of the enemy gain Hasted (2)
thaumaturge.description: Your magic seaps with power, and when you strike down a foe, that power seaps into your allies

thaumaturge.name: Coalescence
thaumaturge.hit: On enemy: Spell + Vitality Damage, On ally: 1d10 heal
thaumaturge.description: Unleash a blast of wild magic that is both invigorating and destructive.

thaumaturge.name: Injury Transference
thaumaturge.hit: The enemy targetted recieves one affliction that an ally within range currently has. The affliction loses one point for the ally.
thaumaturge.description: Take an allies suffering and transfer it onto your foes.

thaumaturge.name: Overcharge
thaumaturge.effect: Can be used on a WILLING ally
thaumaturge.hit: Spell damage. The target adds 2x the damage taken to their next attack.
thaumaturge.description: Launch a huge buff of magic power at your allies, though it rots away at their body.

enemy.name: A Cut Above
enemy.effect: Can equip combat abilities multiple times. The more times it is equipped, the more uses it has.
enemy.description: You are well above an average character, having the endurance ot use many powerful strikes.

enemy.name: Avenge Me!
enemy.effect: Grants Inspired (2) to all allies in range.
enemy.description: Your character was some sort of leader or valued person, and in their death, inspires others to fight.

enemy.name: Bigger!
enemy.description: Your character becomes massive, from a dragon to a mammoth, they take up an enourmous area.

enemy.name: Blessing of Immunity
enemy.effect: Take -10 damage from all attacks with (Pick one: Necrotic, Radiant, Nature, Arcane, Psychic) damage. This ability can be equipped multiple times.
enemy.description: Your character is designed to withstand a certain type of damage.

enemy.name: Blessing of Resistance
enemy.effect: Take -5 damage from all attacks with (Pick one: Necrotic, Radiant, Nature, Arcane, Psychic) damage. This ability can be equipped multiple times.
enemy.description: Your character is designed to withstand a certain type of damage.

enemy.name: Elemental Immunity
enemy.effect: Take -10 damage from all attacks with (Pick one: Fire, Water, Ice, Lightning, Earth, Wind) damage. This ability can be equipped multiple times.
enemy.description: Your character is designed to withstand a certain type of damage.

enemy.name: Elemental Resistance
enemy.effect: Take -5 damage from all attacks with (Pick one: Fire, Water, Ice, Lightning, Earth, Wind) damage. This ability can be equipped multiple times.
enemy.description: Your character is designed to withstand a certain type of damage.

enemy.name: Faster!
enemy.description: Your character may dash around at lightning speed or glide from space to space!

enemy.name: Harder!
enemy.effect: +2 to defense or +4 to grit or +4 to reflex
enemy.description: Your character may have heavy plating, or a thick hide, or lightning reflexes.

enemy.name: Legendary
enemy.effect: Can equip chapter abilities multiple times. The more times it is equipped, the more uses it has.
enemy.description: You are one of the best of the best, able to use incredible abilities at will.

enemy.name: Operator
enemy.description: Your character is resourceful, and can seize the perfect moment to strike.

enemy.name: Self Destruct
enemy.description: In a fiery explosion, your character is blasted away and scorches the ground where they once stood.

enemy.name: Shield Generator
enemy.description: Your character can projected a barrier onto an ally to keep them resistant to damage.

enemy.name: Specialized Immunity
enemy.effect: Take -10 damage from all attacks with (Pick one: Piercing, Slashing, Crushing) damage. This ability can be equipped multiple times.
enemy.description: Your character is designed to withstand a certain type of damage.

enemy.name: Specialized Resistance
enemy.effect: Take -5 damage from all attacks with (Pick one: Piercing, Slashing, Crushing) damage. This ability can be equipped multiple times.
enemy.description: Your character is designed to withstand a certain type of damage.

enemy.name: Stronger!
enemy.description: Your character has thick muscles, or sharp claws, or years of experience.

enemy.name: Totem
enemy.effect: Character is permanently inspired and rooted.
enemy.description: Your character is immovable but considerably more powerful.

warlock.name: Bolt of Cursing
warlock.hit: Spell Damage. In addition, Disoriented (1) OR Numbed (1)
warlock.description: A black bolt of magic skips across the ground, infecting your enemy from the bottom up.

warlock.name: Burst of Tendrils
warlock.hit: Weapon + Force Damage. Choose whether the enemy is pushed 2 spaces or pulled 2 spaces
warlock.description: Lash out at your foe with whipping tendrils, grabbing or shoving them.

warlock.name: Dreadful Beam
warlock.effect: Choose to either target Grit or Defence
warlock.description: You fire an eldritch beam of magic at your target, it's properties are moulded in an incomprehensible manner to suit your needs.

warlock.name: Eldritch Rebuke
warlock.trigger: When an enemy hits you with an ability that has one target
warlock.effect: When an enemy targets you with an ability that targets one character and hits, you may use this reaction to counterattack
warlock.description: An enemy damages their target, only to have a wash of dread encompass their body as retribution

warlock.name: Empathic Curse
warlock.hit: Inflict the opponent with one of Disoriented (2), Staggered (2), or Numbed (2). Take (1) point of the chosen Affliction on yourself.
warlock.description: For every action, there must be a reaction

warlock.name: Nightmare Curse
warlock.effect: You curse the target. Every hit you make against them deals 1d8 bonus damage, however every attack the target makes against the caster also deals 1d8 bonus damage. Lasts until the end of combat.
warlock.description: Bind your fate to another, making your attacks more powerful against each other.

warlock.name: Portal of Tendrils
warlock.effect: At the end of the target's next turn, roll this attack roll again. On a success, reapply disoriented (1) and immobolised (1). On a failure the spell ends. Continue to roll this way at the end of the target's turns until the effect ends.
warlock.description: Open a portal that grabs the enemy with long slimy tendrils

warlock.name: Soul Lock
warlock.hit: Force Damage. Target cannot be healed until the end of their second turn.
warlock.description: Sealing off the target from any magical help, their body is left to fester and suffer as is.

warlock.name: Exodus of Torment
warlock.hit: The target vanishes. At the end of the round, the target reappears in the same space or the closest space possible and takes 4 Weapon + Force Damage
warlock.description: The enemy dissapears to another plane, and when they return, it seems like they've truly seen hell.

warlock.name: Grasp of the Void
warlock.description: Remove any sense of physical body from your foe.

warlock.name: Sensory Enlightenment
warlock.hit: The Target is Phantomed (1), Numbed (1), Blinded (1), Deafened (1), and knocked Prone
warlock.description: The target is momentarily overload by stimuli, leaving them writhing.

warlock.name: Third Eye
warlock.effect: Before you choose the target of this ability, you can see through everything in range, even if they are hidden behind total cover, invisible, or if you didn't know they were there prior to using this ability.
warlock.hit: 2 Weapon + Force damage and the target is blinded (1)
warlock.description: Your Third Eye opens, granting you the power to see through everything around you, even through invisibility. Then with power unfathomable, you attack a target, regardless of what phyisical barriers lie between you.

book of nature.name: Acid Splash
book of nature.description: The caster dissolves away at their target, melting them through metal, flesh, and bone.

book of nature.name: Infection
book of nature.description: The caster rots the body of the target, weakening them by the second.

book of nature.name: Poison Mist
book of nature.description: The caster sprays a thing mist of poison, rotting away the lungs of those who breath it.

book of nature.name: Root
book of nature.hit: Rooted (1). At the start of the enemies turn, remake the attack.
book of nature.description: The caster raises vines from the ground that ensnare foes.

book of nature.name: Wasp Swarm
book of nature.description: The caster calls upon a swarm of angry wasps, calling them to sting the target with no remorse.

book of nature.name: Scorpion Sting
book of nature.description: The caster summons a small pack of scorpions that sting the target, inflicting them with vile poison.

tinkerer.name: Bomb Bot
tinkerer.effect: Create a Bomb Bot in an adjacent space. The Bomb Bot takes it's turn immediately after your turn ends. The only thing the bot can do is move up to 5 spaces in one direction. At the end of it's second turn, the bot explodes. You can also use your reaction after any characters turn ends to trigger the explosion. The Bot has 1 HP and all defensive stats are 14. If the bot is reduced to 0 Health, the bot is destroyed without exploding.
tinkerer.hit: 2d8 + 2 Intellect Damage. The Bot is destroyed
tinkerer.miss: Intellect damage. The bot is destroyed.
tinkerer.description: Bomb bots waddle along the ground, and when they find their mark, erupt in a violent blast of fire and shrapnel.

tinkerer.name: Boost Bot
tinkerer.effect: Create a Boost Bot. When created, assign the Boost Bot a target. After every turn (inlcuding this one), the Boost Bot will move 5 spaces towards it's target. Once it reaches it's target, it gives them Inspired (1). The bot will continue to follow it's target and reapply Inspired (1) at the end of every turn until it is destroyed. The Bot has 1 HP and all defensive stats are 14. If the bot is reduced to 0 Health, the bot is destroyed.
tinkerer.description: Create a boost bot to follow an ally and improve their combat capabilities

tinkerer.name: Grab Bot
tinkerer.effect: Create a Grab Bot. When created, assign the Grab Bot a target. After every turn (inlcuding this one), the Grab Bot will move 5 spaces towards it's target. Once it reaches it's target, it grabs them. The Bot has 1 HP and all defensive stats are 14. If the bot is reduced to 0 Health, the bot is destroyed.
tinkerer.hit: Immobolized (2 turns). Afterwards the bot is destroyed.
tinkerer.description: The grab bot charges down it's foe and wraps it's arms around them, rendering them immobile!

tinkerer.name: Wall Bot
tinkerer.hit: Create a Wall Bot. After every turn (Including this one), you may move the Wall Bot up to 5 spaces in any direction or rotate it. Blocks ranged projectiles and line of sight. The Bot has 15HP and all defensive stats are 14. If the Bot is reduced to 0 Health, the bot is destroyed.
tinkerer.description: Create a wall bot, a moving barricade that can protect your team from attacks.

tinkerer.name: Gun Bot
tinkerer.effect: Create a Gun Bot. When created, assign the Gun Bot a target. After every turn (Inlcuding this one), if the Gun Bot is within range 10 and has line of sight on the target, it may attack. The Bot has 1HP and all defensive stats are 14. If the bot is reduced to 0 health the bot is destroyed.
tinkerer.description: The gun bot is good for bullying one foe, and keeping them at arms length

tinkerer.name: Medic Bot
tinkerer.effect: Create a Medic Bot. When created, assign the Medic Bot a target. After every turn (inlcuding this one), the Medic Bot will move 5 spaces towards it's target. Once it reaches it's target, it attempts to heal them them. The Bot has 1 HP and all defensive stats are 14. If the bot is reduced to 0 Health, the bot is destroyed.
tinkerer.hit: 2d8 + Intellect Heal. The Bot is destroyed.
tinkerer.description: Create a medic bot to heal your allies, although the bot must reach your ally

tinkerer.name: Shock Bot
tinkerer.effect: Create a Shock Bot. After every turn (Inlcuding this one), If there are any targets within range 2 of the Shock Bot, they are attacked. The Bot has 1HP and all defensive stats are 14. If the bot is reduced to 0 health the bot is destroyed.
tinkerer.description: The shock bot is a strong area control tool, but is more planted than other bots

tinkerer.name: Survey Bot
tinkerer.effect: Create a Survey Bot. After every turn (including this one), you may move this bot up to 5 spaces in any direction. At any time, you may learn the exact HP, Defense, Grit, and Reflex of a target within range 10 of the Survey Bot. The Bot has 1HP and Defensive stats are 14. If the bot is reduced to 0 health the bot is destroyed.
tinkerer.description: The survey bot uses top of the line machinery to look for weaknesses in the enemy, using nothing but some lenses and a little magic.

tinkerer.name: Better Bots
tinkerer.description: All of your bots were made with an immense amount of care, and are a cut above the rest.

tinkerer.name: Bike Bot
tinkerer.effect: Create a Bike Bot. At the end of every turn (including this one), you may command the Bike Bot to move 6 spaces. It is a free action for you or an ally to mount the Bike Bot. Once mounted, your speed becomes 6 and you occupy the same space as the Bike Bot. If you take damage while riding, the Bike Bot is destroyed. If the Bike Bot is stationary, it has 1HP and defensive stats are 14. If the bot is reduced to 0HP, the bot is destroyed.
tinkerer.description: Create a bike bot that can carry you and your allies around the battle at high speed.

tinkerer.name: Mortar Bot
tinkerer.effect: Create a Mortar Bot. At the end of your turn (Not including this turn) the Mortar Bot may attack the closest target within range 20. The Bot has 1HP and all defensive stats are 10. If the bot is reduced to 0 health the bot is destroyed.
tinkerer.description: The mortar bot, while highly unpredictable, is incredibly deadly.

tinkerer.name: Seeker Bot
tinkerer.effect: Create a Seeker Bot. When created, assign the Seeker bot a target. At the end of your turn (inlcuding this turn), the Seeker bot moves up to 3 spaces towards it's target. If it is within range 5, it attacks. The Bot has 1HP and all defensive stats are 12. If the bot is reduced to 0 health the bot is destroyed.
tinkerer.description: The seeker bot is persistent, chasing down it's target and rattling them with light attacks.

slashing mastery.name: Abrupt Feint
slashing mastery.description: A show of skilled sword play causes your opponenent to briefly leave themselves open.

slashing mastery.name: Cut the Hand
slashing mastery.description: Slash at your enemies limbs, weakening their ability to fight back.

slashing mastery.name: Deep Gash
slashing mastery.description: Cut a deep wound that spits up buckets of bood

slashing mastery.name: Fierce Laceration
slashing mastery.description: A powerful attack that greatly reduces an enemies combat ability

slashing mastery.name: Gouge the Wound
slashing mastery.effect: The Target must not have full Health.
slashing mastery.description: A deadly strike that can rip into pre existing wounds

slashing mastery.name: Low Swipe
slashing mastery.description: Strike at your enemies legs, reducing their ability to move

slashing mastery.name: Slice Tendons
slashing mastery.description: Strike at your enemies tendons, negating their ability to move.
